atk-s0513a3:2610_0: Atha naṃ kilametvā thokaṃ sithilamakāsi. Atha sappo “kakkaṭakā nāma neva kākamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2610_1: khādanti, na sappamaṃsaṃ, atha kena nu kho kāraṇena ayaṃ amhe gaṇhī”ti cintetvā taṃ
atk-s0513a3:2612: “Na vāyasaṃ no pana kaṇhasappaṃ, ghāsatthiko kakkaṭako adeyya;
atk-s0513a3:2613: Pucchāmi taṃ āyatacakkhunetta, atha kissa hetumha ubho gahītā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2614: Tattha ghāsatthikoti āhāratthiko hutvā. Adeyyātiādiyeyya, na-kārena yojetvā na gaṇhīti attho.
atk-s0513a3:2615: Taṃ sutvā kakkaṭako gahaṇakāraṇaṃ kathento dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:2617: “Ayaṃ puriso mama atthakāmo, yo maṃ gahetvāna dakāya neti;
atk-s0513a3:2618: Tasmiṃ mate dukkhamanappakaṃ me, ahañca eso ca ubho na homa.
atk-s0513a3:2620: “Mamañca disvāna pavaddhakāyaṃ, sabbo jano hiṃsitumeva micche;
atk-s0513a3:2621: Sāduñca thūlañca muduñca maṃsaṃ, kākāpi maṃ disva viheṭhayeyyu”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2622_0: Tattha ayanti bodhisattaṃ niddisati. Atthakāmoti hitakāmo. Dakāya netīti yo maṃ sampiyāyamāno
atk-s0513a3:2622_1: uttarisāṭakena gahetvāna udakāya neti, attano vasanakasobbhaṃ pāpeti. Tasmiṃ mateti
atk-s0513a3:2622_2: sace so imasmiṃ ṭhāne marissati, etasmiṃ mate mama kāyikaṃ cetasikaṃ mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2622_3: bhavissatīti dīpeti. Ubho na homāti dvepi janā na bhavissāma. Mamañca disvānāti gāthāya
atk-s0513a3:2622_4: ayamattho – idañca aparaṃ kāraṇaṃ, imasmiṃ mate anāthaṃ nippaccayaṃ maṃ pavaḍḍhitakāyaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2622_5: disvā sabbo jano “imassa kakkaṭakassa sāduñca thūlañca muduñca maṃsa”nti maṃ māretuṃ
atk-s0513a3:2622_6: iccheyya, na kevalañca jano manusso, tiracchānabhūtā kākāpi maṃ disvā viheṭhayeyyuṃ
atk-s0513a3:2623: Taṃ sutvā sappo cintesi “ekenupāyena imaṃ vañcetvā kākañca attānañca mocessāmī”ti. Atha naṃ vañcetukāmo chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2625: “Sacetassa hetumha ubho gahītā, uṭṭhātu pose visamāvamāmi;
atk-s0513a3:2626: Mamañca kākañca pamuñca khippaṃ, pure visaṃ gāḷhamupeti macca”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2627_0: Tattha sacetassa hetūti sace etassa kāraṇā. Uṭṭhātūti nibbiso hotu. Visamāvamāmīti
atk-s0513a3:2627_1: ahamassa visaṃ ākaḍḍhāmi, nibbisaṃ naṃ karomi. Pure visaṃ gāḷhamupeti maccanti imañhi
atk-s0513a3:2627_2: maccaṃ mayā anāvamiyamānaṃ visaṃ gāḷhaṃ balavaṃ hutvā upagaccheyya, taṃ yāva na upagacchati,
atk-s0513a3:2627_3: tāvadeva amhe dvepi jane khippaṃ muñcāti.
atk-s0513a3:2628_0: Taṃ sutvā kakkaṭako cintesi “ayaṃ ekenupāyena maṃ dvepi jane vissajjāpetvā palāyitukāmo,
atk-s0513a3:2628_1: mayhaṃ upāyakosallaṃ na jānāti, ahaṃ dāni yathā sappo sañcarituṃ sakkoti, evaṃ aḷaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2628_2: sithilaṃ karissāmi, kākaṃ pana neva vissajjessāmī”ti evaṃ cintetvā sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2630: “Sappaṃ pamokkhāmi na tāva kākaṃ, paṭibandhako hohiti tāva kāko;
atk-s0513a3:2631: Purisañca disvāna sukhiṃ arogaṃ, kākaṃ pamokkhāmi yatheva sappa”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2632: Tattha paṭibandhakoti pāṭibhogo. Yatheva sappanti yathā bhavantaṃ sappaṃ muñcāmi, tathā kākaṃ pamokkhāmi, kevalaṃ tvaṃ imassa brāhmaṇassa sarīrato sīghaṃ visaṃ āvamāhīti.
atk-s0513a3:2633_0: Evañca pana vatvā tassa sukhasañcāraṇatthaṃ aḷaṃ sithilamakāsi. Sappo visaṃ āvamitvā
atk-s0513a3:2633_1: mahāsattassa sarīraṃ nibbisaṃ akāsi. So niddukkho uṭṭhāya pakativaṇṇeneva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:2633_2: Kakkaṭako “sace ime dvepi janā arogā bhavissanti, mayhaṃ sahāyassa vaḍḍhi nāma na
atk-s0513a3:2633_3: bhavissati, vināsessāmi ne”ti cintetvā kattarikāya uppalamakuḷaṃ viya aḷehi ubhinnampi
atk-s0513a3:2633_4: sīsaṃ kappetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi. Kākīpi tamhā ṭhānā palāyi. Bodhisatto sappassa
atk-s0513a3:2633_5: sarīraṃ daṇḍake veṭhetvā gumbapiṭṭhe khipi. Suvaṇṇakakkaṭakaṃ sobbhe vissajjetvā
atk-s0513a3:2633_6: nhatvā sālindiyagāmameva gato. Tato paṭṭhāya kakkaṭakena saddhiṃ adhikataro vissāso ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:2634: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānento osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2636: “Kāko tadā devadatto ahosi, māro pana kaṇhasappo ahosi;
atk-s0513a3:2637: Ānandabhaddo kakkaṭako ahosi, ahaṃ tadā brāhmaṇo homi satthā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2638: Saccapariyosāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Kākī pana gāthāya na vuttā, sā ciñcamāṇavikā ahosīti.
atk-s0513a3:2642_0: Sakuṇo mayhako nāmāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto āgantukaseṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a3:2642_1: Sāvatthiyañhi āgantukaseṭṭhi nāma aḍḍho ahosi mahaddhano. So neva attanā bhoge bhuñji,
atk-s0513a3:2642_2: na paresaṃ adāsi, nānaggarase paṇīte bhojane upanīte taṃ na bhuñjati, bilaṅgadutiyaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2642_3: kaṇājakaṃ eva bhuñjati, dhūpitavāsitesu kāsikavatthesu upanītesu tāni hāretvā thūlathūlasāṭake
atk-s0513a3:2642_4: nivāseti, ājānīyayutte maṇikanakavicitte rathe upanīte tampi harāpetvā kattararathakena
atk-s0513a3:2642_5: gacchati, suvaṇṇacchatte dhāriyamāne taṃ apanetvā paṇṇacchattena dhāriyamānena. So
atk-s0513a3:2642_6: yāvajīvaṃ dānādīsu puññesu ekampi akatvā kālaṃ katvā roruvaniraye nibbatti. Tassa
atk-s0513a3:2642_7: aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ rājabalaṃ sattahi rattidivasehi rājakulaṃ pavesesi. Tasmiṃ pavesite
atk-s0513a3:2642_8: rājā bhuttapātarāso jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisinno “kiṃ, mahārāja, buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2642_9: na karosī”ti vutte “bhante, sāvatthiyaṃ āgantukaseṭṭhino nāma kālakatassa assāmikadhane
atk-s0513a3:2642_10: amhākaṃ ghare āhariyamāneyeva satta rattidivasā gatā, so pana etaṃ dhanaṃ labhitvāpi
atk-s0513a3:2642_11: neva attanā paribhuñji, na paresaṃ adāsi, rakkhasapariggahitapokkharaṇī viyassa dhanaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2642_12: ahosi, so ekadivasampi paṇītabhojanādīnaṃ rasaṃ ananubhavitvāva maraṇamukhaṃ paviṭṭho,
atk-s0513a3:2642_13: evaṃ maccharī apuññasatto kiṃ katvā ettakaṃ dhanaṃ labhi, kena cassa bhogesu cittaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2642_14: na ramī”ti satthāraṃ pucchi. Satthā “mahārāja, dhanalābho ca, dhanaṃ laddhā aparibhuñjanakāraṇañca
atk-s0513a3:2642_15: teneva kata”nti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:2643_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bārāṇasiseṭṭhi assaddho ahosi maccharī,
atk-s0513a3:2643_1: na kassaci kiñci deti, na kañci saṅgaṇhāti. So ekadivasaṃ rājupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0513a3:2643_2: tagarasikhiṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā vanditvā “laddhā, bhante,
atk-s0513a3:2643_3: bhikkhā”ti pucchitvā “nanu carāma mahāseṭṭhī”ti vutte purisaṃ āṇāpesi “gaccha, imaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2643_4: amhākaṃ gharaṃ ānetvā mama pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā amhākaṃ paṭiyattabhattassa pattaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2643_5: pūretvā dāpehī”ti. So paccekabuddhaṃ gharaṃ netvā nisīdāpetvā seṭṭhibhariyāya ācikkhi.
atk-s0513a3:2643_6: Sā nānaggarasabhattassa pattaṃ pūretvā tassa adāsi. So bhattaṃ gahetvā seṭṭhinivesanā
atk-s0513a3:2643_7: nikkhamitvā antaravīthiyaṃ paṭipajji. Seṭṭhi rājakulato paccāgacchanto taṃ disvā
atk-s0513a3:2643_8: vanditvā “laddhaṃ, bhante, bhatta”nti pucchi. “Laddhaṃ mahāseṭṭhī”ti. So pattaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0513a3:2643_9: cittaṃ pasādetuṃ nāsakkhi, “imaṃ me bhattaṃ dāsā vā kammakarā vā bhuñjitvā dukkarampi
atk-s0513a3:2643_10: kammaṃ kareyyuṃ, aho vata me jānī”ti aparacetanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi. Dānañhi
atk-s0513a3:2643_11: nāma tisso cetanā paripuṇṇaṃ kātuṃ sakkontasseva mahapphalaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a3:2644: “Pubbeva dānā sumanā bhavāma, dadampi ve attamanā bhavāma;
atk-s0513a3:2645: Datvāpi ve nānutappāma pacchā, tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā namiyyare. ;
atk-s0513a3:2647: Datvā attamano hoti, esā yaññassa sampadā”. ;
atk-s0513a3:2648_0: Iti, mahārāja, āgantukaseṭṭhi tagarasikhipaccekabuddhassa dinnapaccayena bahuṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2648_1: labhi, datvā aparacetanaṃ paṇītaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya bhoge bhuñjituṃ nāsakkhīti.
atk-s0513a3:2648_2: “Puttaṃ pana kasmā na labhi, bhante”ti? Satthā “puttassa alabhanakāraṇampi teneva
atk-s0513a3:2648_3: kataṃ, mahārājā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:2649_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto asītikoṭivibhave seṭṭhikule
atk-s0513a3:2649_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto mātāpitūnaṃ accayena kaniṭṭhaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā kuṭumbaṃ vicārento
atk-s0513a3:2649_2: gharadvāre dānasālaṃ kāretvā mahādānaṃ pavattento agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Athassa eko putto
atk-s0513a3:2649_3: jāyi. So tassa padasā gamanakāle kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme cānisaṃsaṃ disvā saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a3:2649_4: puttadārena sabbaṃ gharavibhavaṃ kaniṭṭhassa niyyātetvā “appamatto dānaṃ pavattehī”ti
atk-s0513a3:2649_5: ovādaṃ datvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā himavantapadese
atk-s0513a3:2649_6: vihāsi. Kaniṭṭhopissa ekaṃ puttaṃ paṭilabhi. So taṃ vaḍḍhantaṃ disvā cintesi “mama
atk-s0513a3:2649_7: bhātu putte jīvante kuṭumbaṃ bhinditvā dvidhā bhavissati, bhātu puttaṃ māressāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2649_8: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ nadiyaṃ opilāpetvā māresi. Tamenaṃ nhatvā āgataṃ bhātu jāyā “kuhiṃ
atk-s0513a3:2649_9: mama putto”ti pucchi. “Nadiyaṃ udakaṃ kīḷi, atha naṃ udake vicinanto nāddasa”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2650_0: Bodhisatto taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā “idaṃ kiccaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti ākāsenāgantvā bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2650_1: otaritvā sunivattho supāruto tassa gharadvāre ṭhatvā dānasālaṃ adisvā “dānasālāpi
atk-s0513a3:2650_2: iminā asappurisena nāsitā”ti cintesi. Kaniṭṭho tassa āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgantvā mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2650_3: vanditvā pāsādaṃ āropetvā subhojanaṃ bhojesi. So bhattakiccāvasāne sukhakathāya nisinno
atk-s0513a3:2650_4: “dārako na paññāyati, kahaṃ nu kho”ti pucchi. “Mato, bhante”ti. “Kena kāraṇenā”ti?
atk-s0513a3:2650_5: “Udakakīḷanaṭṭhāne asukakāraṇenāti na jānāmī”ti. “Kiṃ tvaṃ asappurisa na jānissasi,
atk-s0513a3:2650_6: tayā katakiccaṃ mayhaṃ pākaṭaṃ, nanu tvaṃ iminā nāma kāraṇena taṃ māresi, kiṃ nu
atk-s0513a3:2650_7: tvaṃ rājādīnaṃ vasena nassamānaṃ dhanaṃ rakkhituṃ sakkuṇeyyāsi, mayhakasakuṇassa
atk-s0513a3:2650_8: ca tuyhañca kiṃ nānākaraṇa”nti? Athassa mahāsatto buddhalīḷāya dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:2656: Bhutvāna pipphaliṃ yanti, vilapatveva so dijo.
atk-s0513a3:2661: “Na so acchādanaṃ bhattaṃ, na mālaṃ na vilepanaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:2662: Anubhoti sakiṃ kiñci, na saṅgaṇhāti ñātake.
atk-s0513a3:2665: Rājāno atha vā corā, dāyādā yeva appiyā;
atk-s0513a3:2669: Tena so kittiṃ pappoti, pecca sagge pamodatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2670_0: Tattha mayhakoti “mayhaṃ mayha”nti viravanavasena evaṃladdhanāmo. Girisānudarīsu
atk-s0513a3:2670_1: caratīti girisānudarīcaro. Pakkaṃ pipphalinti himavantapadese ekaṃ phalabharitaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2670_2: pipphalirukkhaṃ. Kandatīti dijagaṇe taṃ rukkhaṃ parivāretvā pakkāni khādante vāretuṃ
atk-s0513a3:2670_3: “mayhaṃ mayha”nti paridevanto vicarati. Tassevaṃ vilapantassāti tassa vilapantasseva.
atk-s0513a3:2670_4: Bhutvāna vipphaliṃ yantīti taṃ pipphalirukkhaṃ paribhuñjitvā aññaṃ phalasampannaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2670_5: rukkhaṃ gacchanti. Vilapatvevāti so pana dijo vilapatiyeva. Yathodhinti yathākoṭṭhāsaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2670_6: mātāpitābhātubhaginīputtadhītādīnaṃ upabhogaparibhogavasena yo yo koṭṭhāso dātabbo,
atk-s0513a3:2671_0: Sakinti ekavārampi nānubhoti. “Saka”ntipi pāṭho, attano santakampīti attho. Na saṅgaṇhātīti
atk-s0513a3:2671_1: bhattacchādanabījanaṅgalādidānavasena na saṅgaṇhāti. Vilapatveva so naroti etesu
atk-s0513a3:2671_2: rājādīsu dhanaṃ gahetvā gacchantesu kevalaṃ so puriso vilapatiyeva. Dhīroti paṇḍito.
atk-s0513a3:2671_3: Saṅgaṇhātīti attano santikaṃ āgate dubbalañātake bhattacchādanabījanaṅgalādidānena
atk-s0513a3:2671_4: saṅgaṇhāti. Tenāti so puriso tena ñātisaṅgahena catuparisamajjhe kittiñca attano
atk-s0513a3:2671_5: vaṇṇabhaṇanañca pāpuṇāti, pecca sagge devanagare pamodati.
atk-s0513a3:2672: Evaṃ mahāsatto tassa dhammaṃ desetvā dānaṃ pākatikaṃ kāretvā himavantameva gantvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmalokūpago ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:2673_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “iti kho, mahārāja, āgantukaseṭṭhi bhātu puttassa
atk-s0513a3:2673_1: māritattā ettakaṃ kālaṃ neva puttaṃ, na dhītaraṃ alabhī”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0513a3:2673_2: – “tadā kaniṭṭho āgantukaseṭṭhi ahosi, jeṭṭhako pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2677_0: Dubbaṇṇarūpanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lokatthacariyaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu
atk-s0513a3:2677_1: mahākaṇhajātake āvi bhavissati. Tadā pana satthā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi
atk-s0513a3:2677_2: tathāgato lokatthacariyaṃ cariyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:2678_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sakko ahosi. Tadā eko vijjādharo
atk-s0513a3:2678_1: vijjaṃ parivattetvā aḍḍharattasamaye āgantvā bārāṇasirañño aggamahesiyā saddhiṃ aticarati,
atk-s0513a3:2678_2: tassā paricārikāyo sañjāniṃsu. Sā sayameva rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva, eko puriso
atk-s0513a3:2678_3: aḍḍharattasamaye sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā maṃ dūsetī”ti āha. “Sakkhissasi pana kiñci
atk-s0513a3:2678_4: saññāṇaṃ kātu”nti? “Sakkomi, devā”ti sā jātihiṅgulikapātiṃ āharāpetvā tassa purisassa
atk-s0513a3:2678_5: rattiṃ āgantvā abhiramitvā gacchantassa piṭṭhiyaṃ pañcaṅgulikaṃ datvā pātova rañño
atk-s0513a3:2678_6: ārocesi. Rājā manusse āṇāpesi “gacchatha, sabbadisāsu oloketvā piṭṭhiyaṃ katajātihiṅgulapañcaṅgulikapurisaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2678_7: gaṇhathā”ti. Vijjādharopi rattiṃ anācāraṃ katvā divā susāne sūriyaṃ namassanto ekapādena
atk-s0513a3:2678_8: tiṭṭhati. Rājapurisā taṃ disvā parivārayiṃsu. So “pākaṭaṃ me kammaṃ jāta”nti vijjaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2679_0: Rājā taṃ disvā āgatapurise “addasathā”ti pucchi. “Āma, addasāmā”ti. “Ko nāmeso”ti?
atk-s0513a3:2679_1: “Pabbajito, devā”ti. “So hi rattiṃ anācāraṃ katvā divā pabbajitavesena vasati”. Rājā
atk-s0513a3:2679_2: “ime divā samaṇavesena caritvā rattiṃ anācāraṃ karontī”ti pabbajitānaṃ kujjhitvā
atk-s0513a3:2679_3: micchāgahaṇaṃ gahetvā “mayhaṃ vijitā ime sabbe pabbajitā palāyantu, diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0513a3:2679_4: rājāṇaṃ karissantū”ti bheriṃ carāpesi. Tiyojanasatikā kāsiraṭṭhā palāyitvā sabbe
atk-s0513a3:2679_5: pabbajitā aññarājadhāniyo agamiṃsu. Sakalakāsiraṭṭhe manussānaṃ ovādadāyako ekopi
atk-s0513a3:2679_6: dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇo nāhosi. Anovādakā manussā pharusā ahesuṃ, dānasīlavimukhā
atk-s0513a3:2679_7: matamatā yebhuyyena apāye nibbattiṃsu, sagge nibbattanakā nāma nāhesuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2680_0: Sakko nave devaputte apassanto “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti āvajjetvā vijjādharaṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a3:2680_1: bārāṇasiraññā kuddhena micchāgahaṇaṃ gahetvā pabbajitānaṃ raṭṭhā pabbājitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2680_2: ñatvā “ṭhapetvā maṃ añño imassa rañño micchāgahaṇaṃ bhindituṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a3:2680_3: rañño ca raṭṭhavāsīnañca avassayo bhavissāmī”ti cintetvā nandamūlapabbhāre paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2680_4: santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā “bhante, mayhaṃ ekaṃ mahallakaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ detha, kāsiraṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2680_5: pasādessāmī”ti āha. So saṅghattherameva labhi, athassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā taṃ purato
atk-s0513a3:2680_6: katvā sayaṃ pacchato hutvā sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ ṭhapetvā paccekabuddhaṃ namassanto uttamarūpadharo
atk-s0513a3:2680_7: māṇavako hutvā sakalanagarassa matthakena tikkhattuṃ vicaritvā rājadvāraṃ āgantvā
atk-s0513a3:2680_8: ākāse aṭṭhāsi. Amaccā rañño ārocesuṃ “deva, abhirūpo māṇavako ekaṃ samaṇaṃ ānetvā
atk-s0513a3:2680_9: rājadvāre ākāse ṭhito”ti. Rājā āsanā uṭṭhāya sīhapañjare ṭhatvā “māṇavaka, kasmā
atk-s0513a3:2680_10: tvaṃ abhirūpo samāno etassa virūpassa samaṇassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā namassamāno
atk-s0513a3:2680_11: ṭhito”ti tena saddhiṃ sallapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2683: Seyyo nu teso udavā sarikkho, nāmaṃ parassattano cāpi brūhī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2684_0: Tattha ariyavaṇṇīti sundararūpo. Seyyo nu tesoti eso virūpo pabbajito kiṃ nu tayā
atk-s0513a3:2684_1: uttaritaro, udāhu sarikkho. Nāmaṃ parassattano cāpīti etassa parassa ca attano ca
atk-s0513a3:2685: Atha naṃ sakko “mahārāja, samaṇā nāma garuṭṭhāniyā, tena me nāmaṃ lapituṃ na labbhati, mayhaṃ pana te nāmaṃ kathessāmī”ti vatvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2688: Ahañca te nāmadheyyaṃ vadāmi, sakkohamasmī tidasānamindo”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2689_0: Tattha sammaggatānujjugatāna devāti mahārāja, sabbasaṅkhāre yathā sabhāvasarasavasena
atk-s0513a3:2689_1: sammasitvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pattattā sammaggatānaṃ, ujunā ca aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena
atk-s0513a3:2689_2: nibbānaṃ gatattā ujugatānaṃ mahākhīṇāsavānaṃ upapattidevehi uttaritarānaṃ visuddhidevānaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2689_3: upapattidevā nāmagottaṃ na gaṇhanti. Ahañca te nāmadheyyanti apica ahaṃ attano nāmadheyyaṃ tuyhaṃ kathemi.
atk-s0513a3:2690: Taṃ sutvā rājā tatiyagāthāya bhikkhunamassane ānisaṃsaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0513a3:2692: “Yo disvā bhikkhuṃ caraṇūpapannaṃ, purakkhatvā pañjaliko namassati;
atk-s0513a3:2693: Pucchāmi taṃ devarājetamatthaṃ, ito cuto kiṃ labhate sukhaṃ so”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2696: “Yo disvā bhikkhuṃ caraṇūpapannaṃ, purakkhatvā pañjaliko namassati;
atk-s0513a3:2697: Diṭṭheva dhamme labhate pasaṃsaṃ, saggañca so yāti sarīrabhedā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2698_0: Tattha bhikkhunti bhinnakilesaṃ parisuddhapuggalaṃ. Caraṇūpapannanti sīlacaraṇena
atk-s0513a3:2698_1: upetaṃ. Diṭṭheva dhammeti na kevalaṃ ito cutoyeva, imasmiṃ pana attabhāve so pasaṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2699: Rājā sakkassa kathaṃ sutvā attano micchāgahaṇaṃ bhinditvā tuṭṭhamānaso pañcamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2701: “Lakkhī vata me udapādi ajja, yaṃ vāsavaṃ bhūtapatiddasāma;
atk-s0513a3:2702: Bhikkhuñca disvāna tuvañca sakka, kāhāmi puññāni anappakānī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2703_0: Tattha lakkhīti sirī, paññātipi vadanti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ajja mama tava vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2703_1: suṇantasseva kusalākusalavipākajānanapaññā udapādīti. Yanti nipātamattaṃ. Bhūtapatiddasāmāti
atk-s0513a3:2704: Taṃ sutvā sakko paṇḍitassa thutiṃ karonto chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2706: “Addhā have sevitabbā sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino;
atk-s0513a3:2707: Bhikkhuñca disvāna mamañca rāja, karohi puññāni anappakānī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2712: Nihacca mānaṃ abhivādayissaṃ, sutvāna devinda subhāsitānī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2713_0: Tattha sabbātithīyācayogo bhavitvāti sabbesaṃ atithīnaṃ āgatānaṃ āgantukānaṃ yaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2713_1: yaṃ te yācanti, tassa tassa yutto anucchaviko bhavitvā, sabbaṃ tehi yācitayācitaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2713_2: dadamānoti attho. Sutvāna devinda subhāsitānīti tava subhāsitāni sutvā ahaṃ evarūpo
atk-s0513a3:2714_0: Evañca pana vatvā pāsādā oruyha paccekabuddhaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Paccekabuddho
atk-s0513a3:2714_1: ākāse pallaṅkena nisīditvā “mahārāja, vijjādharo na samaṇo, tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya ‘atuccho
atk-s0513a3:2714_2: loko, atthi dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā’ti ñatvā dānaṃ dehi, sīlaṃ rakkha, uposathakammaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2714_3: karohī”ti rājānaṃ ovadi. Sakkopi sakkānubhāvena ākāse ṭhatvā “ito paṭṭhāya appamattā
atk-s0513a3:2714_4: hothā”ti nāgarānaṃ ovādaṃ datvā “palātā samaṇabrāhmaṇā āgacchantū”ti bheriṃ carāpesi.
atk-s0513a3:2714_5: Atha te ubhopi sakaṭṭhānameva agamaṃsu. Rājā tassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni akāsi.
atk-s0513a3:2715: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā paccekabuddho parinibbuto, rājā ānando ahosi, sakko pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2719_0: Yametanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. So kira
atk-s0513a3:2719_1: jetavanā nikkhamitvā kosalaraṭṭhe aññataraṃ araññaṃ nissāya viharanto ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2719_2: padumasaraṃ otaritvā supupphitapadumaṃ disvā adhovāte ṭhatvā upasiṅghi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0513a3:2719_3: tasmiṃ vane adhivatthā devatā “mārisa, tvaṃ gandhatheno nāma, idaṃ te ekaṃ theyyaṅga”nti
atk-s0513a3:2719_4: saṃvejesi. So tāya saṃvejito puna jetavanaṃ āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisinno “kahaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2719_5: bhikkhu nivutthosī”ti puṭṭho “asukavanasaṇḍe nāma, tattha ca maṃ devatā evaṃ nāma
atk-s0513a3:2719_6: saṃvejesī”ti āha. Atha naṃ satthā “na kho bhikkhu pupphaṃ upasiṅghanto tvameva devatāya
atk-s0513a3:2719_7: saṃvejito, porāṇakapaṇḍitāpi saṃvejitapubbā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:2720_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ kāsikagāme brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0513a3:2720_1: nibbattitvā vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ uggahitasippo aparabhāge isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a3:2720_2: ekaṃ padumasaraṃ nissāya upavasanto ekadivasaṃ saraṃ otaritvā supupphitapadumaṃ upasiṅghamāno
atk-s0513a3:2720_3: aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ ekā devadhītā rukkhakkhandhavivare ṭhatvā saṃvejayamānā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2727: “Na harāmi na bhañjāmi, ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:2728: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhathenoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2729: Tattha ārā siṅghāmīti dūre ṭhito ghāyāmi. Vaṇṇenāti kāraṇena.
atk-s0513a3:2730_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe eko puriso tasmiṃ sare bhisāni ceva khaṇati, puṇḍarīkāni ca bhañjati.
atk-s0513a3:2730_1: Bodhisatto taṃ disvā “maṃ ārā ṭhatvā upasiṅghantaṃ ‘coro’ti vadasi, etaṃ purisaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2730_2: kasmā na bhaṇasī”ti tāya saddhiṃ sallapanto tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2733: Evaṃ ākiṇṇakammanto, kasmā eso na vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2735: Athassa avacanakāraṇaṃ ācikkhantī devatā catutthapañcamagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:2738: Tasmiṃ me vacanaṃ natthi, tañcārahāmi vattave.
atk-s0513a3:2742_1: viya ayaṃ pāpamakkhitoyeva, tena kāraṇena tasmiṃ mama vacanaṃ natthi. Tañcārahāmīti
atk-s0513a3:2742_2: samaṇā pana ovādakkhamā honti piyasīlā, tasmā taṃ appamattakampi ayuttaṃ karontaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2742_3: vattuṃ arahāmi samaṇāti. Anaṅgaṇassāti niddosassa tumhādisassa. Abbhāmattaṃva khāyatīti
atk-s0513a3:2742_4: mahāmeghappamāṇaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti, idāni kasmā evarūpaṃ dosaṃ abbohārikaṃ karosīti.
atk-s0513a3:2743: Tāya pana saṃvejito bodhisatto saṃvegappatto chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2745: “Addhā maṃ yakkha jānāsi, atho maṃ anukampasi;
atk-s0513a3:2746: Punapi yakkha vajjāsi, yadā passasi edisa”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2747: Tattha yakkhāti devataṃ ālapati. Vajjāsīti vadeyyāsi. Yadā passasi edisanti yadā mama evarūpaṃ dosaṃ passasi, tadā evaṃ mama vadeyyāsīti vadati.
atk-s0513a3:2751: Tvameva bhikkhu jāneyya, yena gaccheyya suggati”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2752_0: Tattha bhatakāmhaseti tava bhatihatā kammakarāpi na homa. Kiṃkāraṇā taṃ sabbakālaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2752_1: rakkhamānā vicarissāmāti dīpeti. Yena gaccheyyāti bhikkhu yena kammena tvaṃ sugatiṃ
atk-s0513a3:2753: Evaṃ sā tassa ovādaṃ datvā attano vimānameva paviṭṭhā. Bodhisattopi jhānaṃ nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:2754: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne so bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a3:2755: Tadā devadhītā uppalavaṇṇā ahosi, tāpaso pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a3:2759_0: Susukhaṃ vata jīvantīti idaṃ satthā pubbārāme viharanto keḷisīlake bhikkhū ārabbha
atk-s0513a3:2759_1: kathesi. Tesu hi mahāmoggallānattherena pāsādaṃ kampetvā saṃvejitesu dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2759_2: bhikkhū tesaṃ aguṇaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a3:2759_3: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva,
atk-s0513a3:2760_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sakko ahosi. Atha aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0513a3:2760_1: kāsikagāme satta bhātaro kāmesu dosaṃ disvā nikkhamitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā majjhāraññe
atk-s0513a3:2760_2: vasantā yoge yogaṃ akatvā kāyadaḷhībahulā hutvā nānappakāraṃ kīḷaṃ kīḷantā cariṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:2760_3: Sakko devarājā “ime saṃvejessāmī”ti suko hutvā tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a3:2760_4: rukkhe nilīyitvā te saṃvejento paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2763: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca suggatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2764_0: Tattha vighāsādinoti bhuttātirekaṃ bhuñjante sandhāyāha. Diṭṭheva dhammeti ye evarūpā,
atk-s0513a3:2764_1: te diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca tesaṃ sugati hoti, sagge uppajjantīti adhippāyena vadati.
atk-s0513a3:2765: Atha tesu eko tassa vacanaṃ sutvā avasese āmantetvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2769: Tattha bhāsamānassāti mānusikāya vācāya bhaṇantassa. Na nisāmethāti na suṇātha. Idaṃ suṇāthāti idamassa vacanaṃ suṇātha. Sodariyāti samāne udare vutthabhāvena te ālapanto āha.
atk-s0513a3:2770: Atha ne paṭikkhipanto suko tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2775: Te tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sabbepi catutthaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a3:2780: Tattha sikhaṇḍinoti cūḷāya samannāgatā. Vighāsenevāti ettakaṃ kālaṃ satta vassāni sīhabyagghavighāseneva yāpentā yadi bhoto gārayhā, atha ke nu te pasaṃsiyāti.
atk-s0513a3:2786: Taṃ sutvā tāpasā “sace mayaṃ na vighāsādā, atha ke carahi te vighāsādā”ti? Atha tesaṃ so tamatthaṃ ācikkhanto chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2789: Datvāva sesaṃ bhuñjanti, te janā vighāsādino”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2790: Tattha vanibbinoti taṃ taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ yācanakassa. Evaṃ te lajjāpetvā mahāsatto sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0513a3:2791: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā satta bhātaro ime keḷisīlakā bhikkhū ahesuṃ, sakko pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2795_0: Paṇītanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ lolabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. Tañhi
atk-s0513a3:2795_1: satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu lolo”ti pucchitvā “āma, bhante”ti vutte “na kho
atk-s0513a3:2795_2: bhikkhu idāneva lolo, pubbepi tvaṃ loloyeva, lolatāya pana bārāṇasiyaṃ hatthigavāssapurisakuṇapehi
atk-s0513a3:2795_3: atitto ‘ito uttaritaraṃ labhissāmī’ti araññaṃ paviṭṭhosī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:2796_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto vaṭṭakayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a3:2796_1: araññe lūkhatiṇabījāhāro vasi. Tadā bārāṇasiyaṃ eko lolakāko hatthikuṇapādīhi atitto
atk-s0513a3:2796_2: “ito uttaritaraṃ labhissāmī”ti araññaṃ pavisitvā phalāphalaṃ khādanto bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2796_3: disvā “ayaṃ vaṭṭako ativiya thūlasarīro, madhuraṃ gocaraṃ khādati maññe, etassa gocaraṃ
atk-s0513a3:2796_4: pucchitvā taṃ khāditvā ahampi thūlo bhavissāmī”ti cintetvā bodhisattassa uparibhāge
atk-s0513a3:2796_5: sākhāya nilīyitvā bodhisattaṃ pucchi “bho vaṭṭaka, kiṃ nāma paṇītāhāraṃ bhuñjasi,
atk-s0513a3:2796_6: thūlasarīro ahosī”ti? Bodhisatto tena pucchito tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karonto
atk-s0513a3:2799: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, kiso tvamasi vāyasā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2800: Tattha bhattanti manussānaṃ bhojananiyāmena paṭiyāditabhattaṃ. Mātulāti taṃ piyasamudācārena ālapati. Kisoti appamaṃsalohito.
atk-s0513a3:2801: Tassa vacanaṃ sutvā kāko tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:2807: Laddho piṇḍo na pīṇeti, kiso tenasmi vaṭṭaka.
atk-s0513a3:2810: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, thūlo tvamasi vaṭṭakā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2811_0: Tattha daḷhiyanti evarūpassa mayhaṃ kākassa kuto daḷhībhāvo, kuto thūlanti attho.
atk-s0513a3:2811_1: Ubbeginoti ubbegavanto. Dhaṅkāti kākānameva nāmaṃ. Pāpena kammunā laddhoti kākena
atk-s0513a3:2811_2: manussasantakavilumpanasaṅkhātena pāpena kammena laddho piṇḍo. Na pīṇetīti na tappeti.
atk-s0513a3:2811_3: Tenasmīti tena kāraṇenāhaṃ kiso asmi. Appasnehānīti mandojāni. Idaṃ kāko bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2811_4: “paṇītabhojanaṃ khādatī”ti saññī hutvāpi vaṭṭakānaṃ gahitagocaraṃ pucchanto āha.
atk-s0513a3:2812: Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto attano thūlabhāvakāraṇaṃ kathento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:2819_0: Tattha appicchāti āhāresu appicchatāya nittaṇhatāya, kevalaṃ sarīrayāpanavaseneva
atk-s0513a3:2819_1: āhārāharaṇatāyāti attho. Appacintāyāti “ajja kahaṃ āhāraṃ labhissāmi, sve kaha”nti
atk-s0513a3:2819_2: evaṃ āhāracintāya abhāvena. Adūragamanena cāti “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne madhuraṃ labhissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a3:2819_3: cintetvā avidūragamanena ca. Laddhāladdhenāti lūkhaṃ vā hotu paṇītaṃ vā, yaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2819_4: teneva. Thūlo tenasmīti tena catubbidhena kāraṇena thūlo asmi. Vāyasāti kākaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0513a3:2819_5: Appacintasukhassāti āhāracintārahitānaṃ appacintānamariyānaṃ sukhaṃ assatthīti appacintasukho,
atk-s0513a3:2819_6: tassa tādisena sukhena samannāgatassa. Susaṅgahitamānassāti “ettakaṃ bhuñjitvā jīrāpetuṃ
atk-s0513a3:2819_7: sakkhissāmī”ti evaṃ suṭṭhu saṅgahitāhāramānassa. Vuttī susamudānayāti evarūpassa
atk-s0513a3:2819_8: puggalassa jīvitavutti sukhena sakkā samudānetuṃ susamudānayā sunibbattiyā.
atk-s0513a3:2820: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne lolabhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a3:2821: Tadā kāko lolabhikkhu ahosi, vaṭṭako pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a3:2825: Cirassaṃ vata passāmīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lolabhikkhuṃyeva ārabbha kathesi. Paccuppannavatthu heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0513a3:2826_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto pārāvato hutvā bārāṇasiseṭṭhino
atk-s0513a3:2826_1: mahānase nīḷapacchiyaṃ vasati. Kākopi tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ katvā tattheva vasatīti
atk-s0513a3:2826_2: sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Bhattakārako kākapattāni luñcitvā piṭṭhena taṃ makkhetvā ekaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2826_3: kapālakhaṇḍaṃ vijjhitvā kaṇṭhe piḷandhitvā pacchiyaṃ pakkhipi. Bodhisatto araññato
atk-s0513a3:2826_4: āgantvā taṃ disvā parihāsaṃ karonto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2829: Sukatā massukuttiyā, sobhate vata me sakhā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2834: Cirassaṃ nhāpitaṃ laddhā, lomaṃ taṃ ajja hārayi”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2835: Tattha ahaṃ kammesu byāvaṭoti ahaṃ samma pārāvata, rājakammesu byāvaṭo okāsaṃ alabhanto parūḷhakacchanakhalomo ahosinti vadati. Ajja hārayinti ajja hāresiṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2838: “Yaṃ nu lomaṃ ahāresi, dullabhaṃ laddha kappakaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:2839: Atha kiñcarahi te samma, kaṇṭhe kiṇikiṇāyatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2840: Tassattho – yaṃ tāva dullabhaṃ kappakaṃ labhitvā lomaṃ harāpesi, taṃ harāpaya, atha kiñcarahi te vayassa idaṃ kaṇṭhe kiṇikiṇāyatīti.
atk-s0513a3:2844: Tesāhaṃ anusikkhāmi, mā tvaṃ maññi davā kataṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2847: Kārayissāmi te samma, maṇiñcāpi dadāmi te”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2848_0: Tattha maṇīti evarūpānaṃ manussānaṃ ekaṃ maṇiratanaṃ kaṇṭhesu lambati. Tesāhanti
atk-s0513a3:2848_1: tesaṃ ahaṃ. Mā tvaṃ maññīti tvaṃ pana “etaṃ mayā davā kata”nti mā maññi. Sacepimaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2848_2: pihayasīti sace imaṃ mama kataṃ massukuttiṃ tvaṃ icchasi.
atk-s0513a3:2852: Āmanta kho taṃ gacchāmi, piyaṃ me tavadassana”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2853_0: Tattha maṇināti maṇino, ayameva vā pāṭho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – samma vāyasa, tvaññeva
atk-s0513a3:2853_1: imassa maṇino anucchaviko imissā ca sukatāya massuyā, mama pana tava adassanameva
atk-s0513a3:2854: Evañca pana vatvā bodhisatto uppatitvā aññattha gato. Kāko tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ patto.
atk-s0513a3:2855_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a3:2855_1: lolabhikkhu anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahi. Tadā kāko lolabhikkhu ahosi, pārāvato pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a3:2870: Diyaḍḍhakukkūti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto rājovādaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Paccuppannavatthu tesakuṇajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a3:2871_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa atthadhammānusāsako
atk-s0513a3:2871_1: amacco ahosi. Rājā agatigamane patiṭṭhāya adhammena rajjaṃ kāresi, janapadaṃ pīḷetvā
atk-s0513a3:2871_2: dhanameva saṃhari. Bodhisatto rājānaṃ ovaditukāmo ekaṃ upamaṃ upadhārento vicarati,
atk-s0513a3:2871_3: rañño uyyāne vāsāgāraṃ vippakataṃ hoti aniṭṭhitacchadanaṃ, dārukaṇṇikaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0513a3:2871_4: gopānasiyo pavesitamattā honti. Rājā kīḷanatthāya uyyānaṃ gantvā tattha vicaritvā
atk-s0513a3:2871_5: taṃ gehaṃ pavisitvā ullokento kaṇṇikamaṇḍalaṃ disvā attano uparipatanabhayena nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a3:2871_6: bahi ṭhito puna oloketvā “kiṃ nu kho nissāya kaṇṇikā ṭhitā, kiṃ nissāya gopānasiyo”ti
atk-s0513a3:2873: “Diyaḍḍhakukkū udayena kaṇṇikā, vidatthiyo aṭṭha parikkhipanti naṃ;
atk-s0513a3:2874: Sā siṃsapā, sāramayā apheggukā, kuhiṃ ṭhitā upparito na dhaṃsatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2875_0: Tattha diyaḍḍhakukkūti diyaḍḍharatanā. Udayenāti uccattena. Parikkhipanti nanti taṃ
atk-s0513a3:2875_1: panetaṃ aṭṭha vidatthiyo parikkhipanti, parikkhepato aṭṭhavidatthipamāṇāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2875_2: hoti. Kuhiṃ ṭhitāti kattha patiṭṭhitā hutvā. Na dhaṃsatīti na patati.
atk-s0513a3:2876: Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto “laddhā dāni me rañño ovādatthāya upamā”ti cintetvā imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0513a3:2878: “Yā tiṃsati sāramayā anujjukā, parikiriya gopānasiyo samaṃ ṭhitā;
atk-s0513a3:2879: Tāhi susaṅgahitā balasā pīḷitā, samaṃ ṭhitā upparito na dhaṃsati.
atk-s0513a3:2881: “Evampi mittehi daḷhehi paṇḍito, abhejjarūpehi sucīhi mantibhi;
atk-s0513a3:2882: Susaṅgahīto siriyā na dhaṃsati, gopānasībhāravahāva kaṇṇikā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2883_0: Tattha yā tiṃsati sāramayāti yā etā sārarukkhamayā tiṃsati gopānasiyo. Parikiriyāti
atk-s0513a3:2883_1: parivāretvā. Samaṃ ṭhitāti samabhāgena ṭhitā. Balasā pīḷitāti tāhi tāhi gopānasīhi
atk-s0513a3:2883_2: balena pīḷitā suṭṭhu saṅgahitā ekābaddhā hutvā. Paṇḍitoti ñāṇasampanno rājā. Sucīhīti
atk-s0513a3:2883_3: sucisamācārehi kalyāṇamittehi. Mantibhīti mantakusalehi. Gopānasībhāravahāva kaṇṇikāti
atk-s0513a3:2883_4: yathā gopānasīnaṃ bhāraṃ vahamānā kaṇṇikā na dhaṃsati na patati, evaṃ rājāpi vuttappakārehi
atk-s0513a3:2883_5: mantīhi abhijjahadayehi susaṅgahito sirito na dhaṃsati na patati na parihāyati.
atk-s0513a3:2884_0: Rājā bodhisatte kathenteyeva attano kiriyaṃ sallakkhetvā kaṇṇikāya asati gopānasiyo
atk-s0513a3:2884_1: na tiṭṭhanti, gopānasīhi asaṅgahitā kaṇṇikā na tiṭṭhati, gopānasīsu bhijjantīsu kaṇṇikā
atk-s0513a3:2884_2: patati, evameva adhammiko rājā attano mittāmacce ca balakāye ca brāhmaṇagahapatike
atk-s0513a3:2884_3: ca asaṅgaṇhanto tesu bhijjantesu tehi asaṅgahito issariyā dhaṃsati, raññā nāma dhammikena
atk-s0513a3:2884_4: bhavitabbanti. Athassa tasmiṃ khaṇe paṇṇākāratthāya mātuluṅgaṃ āhariṃsu. Rājā “sahāya,
atk-s0513a3:2884_5: imaṃ mātuluṅgaṃ khādā”ti bodhisattaṃ āha. Bodhisatto taṃ gahetvā “mahārāja, imaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2884_6: khādituṃ ajānantā tittakaṃ vā karonti ambilaṃ vā, jānantā pana paṇḍitā tittakaṃ hāretvā
atk-s0513a3:2884_7: ambilaṃ anīharitvā mātuluṅgarasaṃ anāsetvāva khādantī”ti rañño imāya upamāya dhanasaṅgharaṇūpāyaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2886: “Kharattacaṃ bellaṃ yathāpi satthavā, anāmasantopi karoti tittakaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:2887: Samāharaṃ sāduṃ karoti patthiva, asāduṃ kayirā tanubandhamuddharaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2890: Dhammānuvattī paṭipajjamāno, sa phāti kayirā aviheṭhayaṃ para”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2891_0: Tattha kharattacanti thaddhatacaṃ. Bellanti mātuluṅgaṃ. ‘Bela”ntipi pāṭho, ayamevattho.
atk-s0513a3:2891_1: Satthavāti satthakahattho. Anāmasantoti bahitacaṃ tanukampi atacchanto idaṃ phalaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2891_2: tittakaṃ karoti. Samāharanti samāharanto bahitacaṃ tacchanto anto ca ambilaṃ anīharanto
atk-s0513a3:2891_3: taṃ sāduṃ karoti. Patthivāti rājānaṃ ālapati. Tanubandhamuddharanti tanukaṃ pana
atk-s0513a3:2891_4: tacaṃ uddharanto sabbaso tittakassa anapanītattā taṃ asādumeva kayirā. Evanti evaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2891_5: paṇḍito rājāpi asāhasaṃ sāhasiyā taṇhāya vasaṃ agacchanto agatigamanaṃ pahāya raṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2891_6: apīḷetvā upacikānaṃ vammikavaḍḍhananiyāmena madhukarānaṃ reṇuṃ gahetvā madhukaraṇaniyāmena
atk-s0513a3:2894: Iti imesaṃ dasannaṃ rājadhammānaṃ anuvattanena dhammānuvattī hutvā paṭipajjamāno so attano ca paresañca phātiṃ vaḍḍhiṃ kareyya paraṃ aviheṭhentoyevāti.
atk-s0513a3:2895_0: Rājā bodhisattena saddhiṃ mantento pokkharaṇītīraṃ gantvā supupphitaṃ bālasūriyavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2895_1: udakena anupalittaṃ padumaṃ disvā āha – “sahāya, imaṃ padumaṃ udake sañjātameva udakena
atk-s0513a3:2895_2: alimpamānaṃ ṭhita”nti. Atha naṃ bodhisatto “mahārāja, raññā nāma evarūpena bhavitabba”nti
atk-s0513a3:2898: Padumaṃ yathā agginikāsiphālimaṃ, na kaddamo na rajo na vāri limpati.
atk-s0513a3:2901: Na limpati kammakilesa tādiso, jātaṃ yathā pokkharaṇīsu ambuja”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2902_0: Tattha odātamūlanti paṇḍaramūlaṃ. Ambujanti padumasseva vevacanaṃ. Agginikāsiphālimanti
atk-s0513a3:2902_1: agginikāsinā sūriyena phālitaṃ vikasitanti attho. Na kaddamo na rajo na vāri limpatīti
atk-s0513a3:2902_2: neva kaddamo na rajo na udakaṃ limpati, na makkhetīti attho. “Lippati”cceva vā pāṭho,
atk-s0513a3:2902_3: bhummatthe vā etāni paccattavacanāni, etesu kaddamādīsu na lippati, na allīyatīti
atk-s0513a3:2902_4: attho. Vohārasucinti porāṇakehi dhammikarājūhi likhāpetvā ṭhapitavinicchayavohāre
atk-s0513a3:2902_5: suciṃ, agatigamanaṃ pahāya dhammena vinicchayakārakanti attho. Asāhasanti dhammikavinicchaye
atk-s0513a3:2902_6: ṭhitattāyeva sāhasikakiriyāya virahitaṃ. Visuddhakammantanti teneva asāhasikaṭṭhena
atk-s0513a3:2902_7: visuddhakammantaṃ saccavādiṃ nikkodhaṃ majjhattaṃ tulābhūtaṃ lokassa. Apetapāpakanti
atk-s0513a3:2902_8: apagatapāpakammaṃ. Na limpati kammakilesa tādisoti taṃ rājānaṃ pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2902_9: kāmesumicchācāro musāvādoti ayaṃ kammakileso na allīyati. Kiṃkāraṇā? Tādiso jātaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2902_10: yathā pokkharaṇīsu ambujaṃ. Tādiso hi rājā yathā pokkharaṇīsu jātaṃ padumaṃ anupalittaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2903: Rājā bodhisattassa ovādaṃ sutvā tato paṭṭhāya dhammena rajjaṃ kārento dānādīni puññāni katvā saggaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:2904: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā rājā ānando ahosi, paṇḍitāmacco pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2908_0: Yathā cāpo ninnamatīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto vipakkhasevakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a3:2908_1: kathesi. Vatthu pana heṭṭhā mahiḷāmukhajātake vitthāritameva. Tadā pana satthā “na,
atk-s0513a3:2908_2: bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepesa vipakkhasevakoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:2909_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sīho hutvā sīhiyā saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a3:2909_1: saṃvasanto dve potake labhi – puttañca dhītarañca. Puttassa manojoti nāmaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a3:2909_2: so vayappatto ekaṃ sīhapotikaṃ gaṇhi. Iti te pañca janā ahesuṃ. Manojo vanamahiṃsādayo
atk-s0513a3:2909_3: vadhitvā maṃsaṃ āharitvā mātāpitaro ca bhaginiñca pajāpatiñca poseti. So ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2909_4: gocarabhūmiyaṃ giriyaṃ nāma siṅgālaṃ palāyituṃ appahontaṃ urena nipannaṃ disvā “kiṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2909_5: sammā”ti pucchitvā “upaṭṭhātukāmomhi, sāmī”ti vutte “sādhu, upaṭṭhahassū”ti taṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a3:2909_6: attano vasanaguhaṃ ānesi. Bodhisatto taṃ disvā “tāta manoja, siṅgālā nāma dussīlā
atk-s0513a3:2909_7: pāpadhammā akicce niyojenti, mā etaṃ attano santike karī”ti vāretuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a3:2910_0: Athekadivasaṃ siṅgālo assamaṃsaṃ khāditukāmo manojaṃ āha – “sāmi, amhehi ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a3:2910_1: assamaṃsaṃ aññaṃ akhāditapubbaṃ nāma natthi, assaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti. “Kahaṃ pana, samma,
atk-s0513a3:2910_2: assā hontī”ti? “Bārāṇasiyaṃ nadītīre”ti. So tassa vacanaṃ gahetvā tena saddhiṃ assānaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2910_3: nadiyā nhānavelāyaṃ gantvā ekaṃ assaṃ gahetvā piṭṭhiyaṃ āropetvā vegena attano guhādvārameva
atk-s0513a3:2910_4: āgato. Athassa pitā assamaṃsaṃ khāditvā “tāta, assā nāma rājabhogā, rājāno ca nāma
atk-s0513a3:2910_5: anekamāyā kusalehi dhanuggahehi vijjhāpenti, assamaṃsakhādanasīhā nāma dīghāyukā
atk-s0513a3:2910_6: na honti, ito paṭṭhāya mā assaṃ gaṇhī”ti āha. So pitu vacanaṃ akatvā gaṇhateva. “Sīho
atk-s0513a3:2910_7: asse gaṇhātī”ti sutvā rājā antonagareyeva assānaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ kārāpesi. Tatopi āgantvā
atk-s0513a3:2910_8: gaṇhiyeva. Rājā assasālaṃ kāretvā antosālāyameva tiṇodakaṃ dāpesi. Sīho pākāramatthakena
atk-s0513a3:2911_0: Rājā ekaṃ akkhaṇavedhiṃ dhanuggahaṃ pakkosāpetvā “sakkhissasi tāta, sīhaṃ vijjhitu”nti
atk-s0513a3:2911_1: āha. So “sakkomī”ti vatvā pākāraṃ nissāya sīhassa āgamanamagge aṭṭakaṃ kāretvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a3:2911_2: Sīho āgantvā bahisusāne siṅgālaṃ ṭhapetvā assagahaṇatthāya nagaraṃ pakkhandi. Dhanuggaho
atk-s0513a3:2911_3: āgamanakāle “atitikhiṇo vego”ti sīhaṃ avijjhitvā assaṃ gahetvā gamanakāle garubhāratāya
atk-s0513a3:2911_4: olīnavegaṃ sīhaṃ tikhiṇena nārācena pacchābhāge vijjhi. Nārāco purimakāyena nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a3:2911_5: ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. Sīho “viddhosmī”ti viravi. Dhanuggaho taṃ vijjhitvā asani viya
atk-s0513a3:2911_6: jiyaṃ pothesi. Siṅgālo sīhassa ca jiyāya ca saddaṃ sutvā “sahāyo me dhanuggahena
atk-s0513a3:2911_7: vijjhitvā mārito bhavissati, matakena hi saddhiṃ vissāso nāma natthi, idāni mama
atk-s0513a3:2911_8: pakatiyā vasanavanameva gamissāmī”ti attanāva saddhiṃ sallapanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:2914: Haññate nūna manojo, migarājā sakhā mama.
atk-s0513a3:2917: Netādisā sakhā honti, labbhā me jīvato sakhā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2918: Tattha yathāti yenākāreneva cāpo ninnamati. Haññate nūnāti nūna haññati. Netādisāti evarūpā matakā sahāyā nāma na honti. Labbhā meti jīvato mama sahāyo nāma sakkā laddhuṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2919_0: Sīhopi ekavegena gantvā assaṃ guhādvāre pātetvā sayampi maritvā pati. Athassa ñātakā
atk-s0513a3:2919_1: nikkhamitvā taṃ lohitamakkhitaṃ pahāramukhehi paggharitalohitaṃ pāpajanasevitāya
atk-s0513a3:2919_2: jīvitakkhayaṃ pattaṃ addasaṃsu, disvā cassa mātā pitā bhaginī pajāpatīti paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0513a3:2925: Manojaṃ passa semānaṃ, acchannaṃ samhi lohite.
atk-s0513a3:2928: Yo ve hitānaṃ vacanaṃ, na karoti atthadassinaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2930: “Evañca so hoti tato ca pāpiyo, yo uttamo adhamajanūpasevī;
atk-s0513a3:2932_0: Tattha accantaṃ sukhamedhatīti na ciraṃ sukhaṃ labhati. Giriyassānusāsanīti ayaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2932_1: evarūpā giriyassānusāsanīti garahanto āha. Pāpasampavaṅkenāti pāpesu sampavaṅkena
atk-s0513a3:2932_2: pāpasahāyena. Acchannanti nimuggaṃ. Pāpiyo ca nigacchatīti pāpañca vindati. Hitānanti
atk-s0513a3:2932_3: atthakāmānaṃ. Atthadassinanti anāgataatthaṃ passantānaṃ. Pāpiyoti pāpataro. Adhamajanūpasevīti
atk-s0513a3:2935: “Nihīyati puriso nihīnasevī, na ca hāyetha kadāci tulyasevī;
atk-s0513a3:2936: Seṭṭhamupagamaṃ udeti khippaṃ, tasmāttanā uttaritaraṃ bhajethā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2937_0: Tattha nihīyatīti bhikkhave, nihīnasevī nāma manojo sīho viya nihīyati parihāyati
atk-s0513a3:2937_1: vināsaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tulyasevīti sīlādīhi attanā sadisaṃ sevamāno na hāyati, vaḍḍhiyeva
atk-s0513a3:2937_2: panassa hoti. Seṭṭhamupagamanti sīlādīhi uttaritaraṃyeva upagacchanto. Udeti khippanti
atk-s0513a3:2937_3: sīghameva sīlādīhi guṇehi udeti, vuddhiṃ upagacchatīti.
atk-s0513a3:2938: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne vipakkhasevako sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a3:2939: Tadā siṅgālo devadatto ahosi, manojo vipakkhasevako, bhaginī uppalavaṇṇā, bhariyā khemā bhikkhunī, mātā rāhulamātā, pitā sīharājā pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a3:2943: Rājā te bhattanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mātuposakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu sāmajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a3:2944_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto duggatagahapatikule nibbatti,
atk-s0513a3:2944_1: sutanūtissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto bhatiṃ katvā mātāpitaro posetvā pitari kālakate
atk-s0513a3:2944_2: mātaraṃ poseti. Tasmiṃ pana kāle bārāṇasirājā migavittako ahosi. So ekadivasaṃ mahantena
atk-s0513a3:2944_3: parivārena yojanadviyojanamattaṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā “yassa ṭhitaṭṭhānena migo palāyati,
atk-s0513a3:2944_4: so imaṃ nāma jito”ti sabbesaṃ ārocāpesi. Amaccā rañño dhuvamaggaṭṭhāne koṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2944_5: chādetvā adaṃsu. Manussehi migānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānāni parivāretvā unnādentehi uṭṭhāpitesu
atk-s0513a3:2944_6: migesu eko eṇimigo rañño ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ paṭipajji. Rājā “taṃ vijjhissāmī”ti saraṃ khipi.
atk-s0513a3:2944_7: Uggahitamāyo migo saraṃ mahāphāsukābhimukhaṃ āgacchantaṃ ñatvā parivattitvā sarena
atk-s0513a3:2944_8: viddho viya hutvā pati. Rājā “migo me viddho”ti gahaṇatthāya dhāvi. Migo uṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a3:2944_9: vātavegena palāyi, amaccādayo rājānaṃ avahasiṃsu. So migaṃ anubandhitvā kilantakāle
atk-s0513a3:2944_10: khaggena dvidhā chinditvā ekasmiṃ daṇḍake laggitvā kājaṃ vahanto viya āgacchanto
atk-s0513a3:2944_11: “thokaṃ vissamissāmī”ti maggasamīpe ṭhitaṃ vaṭarukkhaṃ upagantvā nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0513a3:2945_0: Tasmiṃ pana vaṭarukkhe nibbatto maghadevo nāma yakkho tattha paviṭṭhe vessavaṇassa
atk-s0513a3:2945_1: santikā khādituṃ labhi. So rājānaṃ uṭṭhāya gacchantaṃ “tiṭṭha bhakkhosi me”ti hatthe
atk-s0513a3:2945_2: gaṇhi. “Tvaṃ konāmosī”ti? “Ahaṃ idha nibbattayakkho, imaṃ ṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhake khādituṃ
atk-s0513a3:2945_3: labhāmī”ti. Rājā satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā “kiṃ ajjeva maṃ khādissasi, udāhu nibaddhaṃ khādissasī”ti
atk-s0513a3:2945_4: pucchi. “Labhanto nibaddhaṃ khādissāmī”ti. Rājā “imaṃ ajja migaṃ khāditvā maṃ vissajjehi,
atk-s0513a3:2945_5: ahaṃ te sve paṭṭhāya ekāya bhattapātiyā saddhiṃ ekaṃ manussaṃ pesessāmī”ti. “Tena
atk-s0513a3:2945_6: hi appamatto hohi, apesitadivase taññeva khādissāmī”ti. “Ahaṃ bārāṇasirājā, mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2945_7: avijjamānaṃ nāma natthī”ti. Yakkho paṭiññaṃ gahetvā taṃ vissajjesi. So nagaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a3:2945_8: tamatthaṃ ekassa atthacarakassa amaccassa kathetvā “idāni kiṃ kātabba”nti pucchi.
atk-s0513a3:2945_9: “Divasaparicchedo kato, devā”ti? “Na kato”ti. “Ayuttaṃ vo kataṃ, evaṃ santepi mā
atk-s0513a3:2945_10: cintayittha, bahū bandhanāgāre manussā”ti. “Tena hi tvaṃ etaṃ kammaṃ kara, mayhaṃ jīvitaṃ dehī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2946_0: Amacco “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā devasikaṃ bandhanāgārato manussaṃ nīharitvā bhattapātiṃ
atk-s0513a3:2946_1: gahetvā kañci ajānāpetvāva yakkhassa pesesi. Yakkho bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā manussaṃ khādati.
atk-s0513a3:2946_2: Aparabhāge bandhanāgārāni nimmanussāni jātāni. Rājā bhattahārakaṃ alabhanto maraṇabhayena
atk-s0513a3:2946_3: kampi. Atha naṃ amacco assāsetvā “deva, jīvitāsāto dhanāsāva balavatarā, hatthikkhandhe
atk-s0513a3:2946_4: sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ ṭhapetvā ‘ko imaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā yakkhassa bhattaṃ ādāya gamissatī’ti
atk-s0513a3:2946_5: bheriṃ carāpemā”ti vatvā tathā kāresi. Atha taṃ sutvā bodhisatto cintesi “ahaṃ bhatiyā
atk-s0513a3:2946_6: māsakaḍḍhamāsakaṃ saṅgharitvā kicchena mātaraṃ posemi, imaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā mātu datvā
atk-s0513a3:2946_7: yakkhassa santikaṃ gamissāmi, sace yakkhaṃ dametuṃ sakkhissāmi, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:2946_8: no ce sakkhissāmi, mātā me sukhaṃ jīvissatī”ti. So tamatthaṃ mātu ārocetvā “alaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2946_9: tāta, na mama attho dhanenā”ti dve vāre paṭikkhipitvā tatiyavāre taṃ anāpucchitvāva
atk-s0513a3:2946_10: “āharatha, ayya, sahassaṃ, ahaṃ bhattaṃ harissāmī”ti sahassaṃ gahetvā mātu datvā
atk-s0513a3:2946_11: “amma, mā cintayi, ahaṃ yakkhaṃ dametvā mahājanassa sotthiṃ karissāmi, ajjeva tava
atk-s0513a3:2946_12: assukilinnamukhaṃ hāsāpentova āgacchissāmī”ti mātaraṃ vanditvā rājapurisehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a3:2947_0: Tato raññā “tāta, tvaṃ bhattaṃ harissasī”ti vutte “āma, devā”ti āha. “Kiṃ te laddhuṃ
atk-s0513a3:2947_1: vaṭṭatī”ti? “Tumhākaṃ suvaṇṇapādukā, devā”ti. “Kiṃkāraṇā”ti? “Deva, so yakkho attano
atk-s0513a3:2947_2: rukkhamūle bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitake khādituṃ labhati, ahaṃ etassa santakabhūmiyaṃ aṭṭhatvā
atk-s0513a3:2947_3: pādukāsu ṭhassāmī”ti. “Aññaṃ kiṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? “Tumhākaṃ chattaṃ, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2947_4: “Idaṃ kimatthāyā”ti? “Deva, yakkho attano rukkhacchāyāya ṭhitake khādituṃ labhati,
atk-s0513a3:2947_5: ahaṃ tassa rukkhacchāyāya aṭṭhatvā chattacchāyāya ṭhassāmī”ti. “Aññaṃ kiṃ laddhuṃ
atk-s0513a3:2947_6: vaṭṭatī”ti. “Tumhākaṃ khaggaṃ, devā”ti. “Iminā ko attho”ti? “Deva, amanussāpi āvudhahatthānaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2947_7: bhāyantiyevā”ti. “Aññaṃ kiṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? “Suvaṇṇapātiṃ pūretvā tumhākaṃ bhuñjanakabhattaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2947_8: detha, devā”ti. “Kiṃkāraṇā, tātā”ti? “Deva, mādisassa nāma paṇḍitassa purisassa mattikapātiyā
atk-s0513a3:2947_9: lūkhabhojanaṃ harituṃ ananucchavika”nti. “Sādhu, tātā”ti rājā sabbaṃ dāpetvā tassa
atk-s0513a3:2948_0: Bodhisatto “mahārāja, mā bhāyittha, ajjāhaṃ yakkhaṃ dametvā tumhākaṃ sotthiṃ katvā
atk-s0513a3:2948_1: āgamissāmī”ti rājānaṃ vanditvā upakaraṇāni gāhāpetvā tattha gantvā manusse rukkhassāvidūre
atk-s0513a3:2948_2: ṭhapetvā suvaṇṇapādukaṃ āruyha khaggaṃ sannayhitvā setacchattaṃ matthake katvā kañcanapātiyā
atk-s0513a3:2948_3: bhattaṃ gahetvā yakkhassa santikaṃ pāyāsi. Yakkho maggaṃ olokento taṃ disvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2948_4: puriso na aññesu divasesu āgamananiyāmena eti, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti cintesi. Bodhisattopi
atk-s0513a3:2948_5: rukkhasamīpaṃ gantvā asituṇḍena bhattapātiṃ antochāyāya karitvā chāyāya pariyante
atk-s0513a3:2952: Tattha pāhesīti pahiṇi. Maghadevasmiṃ adhivattheti maghadevoti vaṭarukkho vuccati, tasmiṃ adhivattheti devataṃ ālapati.
atk-s0513a3:2953: Taṃ sutvā yakkho “imaṃ purisaṃ vañcetvā antochāyāya paviṭṭhaṃ khādissāmī”ti cintetvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2956: Tvañca māṇava bhikkhā ca, ubho bhakkhā bhavissathā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2957: Tattha bhikkhanti mama nibaddhabhikkhaṃ. Sūpitanti sūpasampannaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2963: “Laddhāya yakkhā tava niccabhikkhaṃ, suciṃ paṇītaṃ rasasā upetaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:2964: Bhikkhañca te āhariyo naro idha, sudullabho hehiti bhakkhite mayī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2965_0: Tattha thullamatthanti appakena kāraṇena mahantaṃ atthaṃ jahissasīti dasseti. Nāharissantīti
atk-s0513a3:2965_1: ito paṭṭhāya maraṇasaññino hutvā na āharissanti, atha tvaṃ milātasākho viya rukkho
atk-s0513a3:2965_2: nirāhāro dubbalo bhavissasīti. Laddhāyanti laddhaayaṃ laddhāgamanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2965_3: hoti – samma yakkha, yaṃ ahaṃ ajja āhariṃ, idaṃ tava niccabhikkhaṃ suciṃ paṇītaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2965_4: uttamaṃ rasena upetaṃ laddhāgamanaṃ devasikaṃ te āgacchissati. Āhariyoti āharaṇako.
atk-s0513a3:2965_5: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “sace tvaṃ imaṃ bhikkhaṃ gahetvā āgataṃ maṃ bhakkhasi, athevaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2965_6: mayi bhakkhite bhikkhañca te āharaṇako añño naro idha sudullabho bhavissati. Kiṃkāraṇā?
atk-s0513a3:2965_7: Mādiso hi bārāṇasiyaṃ añño paṇḍitamanusso nāma natthi, mayi pana khādite sutanupi
atk-s0513a3:2965_8: nāma yakkhena khādito, aññassa kassa so lajjissatī”ti bhattāharaṇakaṃ na labhissasi,
atk-s0513a3:2965_9: atha te ito paṭṭhāya bhojanaṃ dullabhaṃ bhavissati, amhākampi rājānaṃ gaṇhituṃ na
atk-s0513a3:2965_10: labhissasi. Kasmā? Rukkhato bahibhāvena. Sace panidaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā maṃ pahiṇissasi,
atk-s0513a3:2965_11: ahaṃ te rañño kathetvā nibaddhaṃ bhattaṃ pesessāmi, attānampi ca te khādituṃ na dassāmi,
atk-s0513a3:2965_12: ahampi tava santike ṭhāne na ṭhassāmi, pādukāsu ṭhassāmi, rukkhacchāyāyampi te na
atk-s0513a3:2965_13: ṭhassāmi, attano chattacchāyāyameva ṭhassāmi, sace pana mayā saddhiṃ virujjhissasi,
atk-s0513a3:2965_14: khaggena taṃ dvidhā bhindissāmi, ahañhi ajja etadatthameva sajjo hutvā āgatoti. Evaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2966: Yakkho “yuttarūpaṃ māṇavo vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā pasannacitto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a3:2969: Mayā tvaṃ samanuññāto, sotthiṃ passāhi mātaraṃ.
atk-s0513a3:2972: Sotthiṃ passatu te mātā, tvañca passāhi mātara”nti.
atk-s0513a3:2973: Tattha sutanoti bodhisattaṃ ālapati. Yathā bhāsasīti yathā tvaṃ bhāsasi, tathā yo esa tayā bhāsito attho, eso mamevattho, mayhameva vaḍḍhīti.
atk-s0513a3:2974_0: Yakkhassa kathaṃ sutvā bodhisatto “mama kammaṃ nipphannaṃ, damito me yakkho, bahuñca
atk-s0513a3:2974_1: dhanaṃ laddhaṃ, rañño ca vacanaṃ kata”nti tuṭṭhacitto yakkhassa anumodanaṃ karonto osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2976: “Evaṃ yakkha sukhī hohi, saha sabbehi ñātibhi;
atk-s0513a3:2977: Dhanañca me adhigataṃ, rañño ca vacanaṃ kata”nti. –
atk-s0513a3:2978_0: Vatvā ca pana yakkhaṃ āmantetvā “samma, tvaṃ pubbe akusalakammaṃ katvā kakkhaḷo pharuso
atk-s0513a3:2978_1: paresaṃ lohitamaṃsabhakkho yakkho hutvā nibbatto, ito paṭṭhāya pāṇātipātādīni mā
atk-s0513a3:2978_2: karī”ti sīle ca ānisaṃsaṃ, dussīlye ca ādīnavaṃ kathetvā yakkhaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0513a3:2978_3: “kiṃ te araññavāsena, ehi nagaradvāre taṃ nisīdāpetvā aggabhattalābhiṃ karomī”ti
atk-s0513a3:2978_4: yakkhena saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā khaggādīni yakkhaṃ gāhāpetvā bārāṇasiṃ agamāsi. “Sutanu
atk-s0513a3:2978_5: māṇavo yakkhaṃ gahetvā etī”ti rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā amaccaparivuto bodhisattassa paccuggamanaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2978_6: katvā yakkhaṃ nagaradvāre nisīdāpetvā aggabhattalābhinaṃ katvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a3:2978_7: bheriṃ carāpetvā nāgare sannipātāpetvā bodhisattassa guṇaṃ kathetvā senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2978_8: adāsi. Ayañca bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā saggaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:2979_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a3:2979_1: mātuposakabhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Tadā yakkho aṅgulimālo ahosi, rājā ānando,
atk-s0513a3:2983: Te kathaṃ nu karissantīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ mātuposakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu sāmajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a3:2984_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto gijjhayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a3:2984_1: vayappatto vuddhe parihīnacakkhuke mātāpitaro gijjhaguhāyaṃ ṭhapetvā gomaṃsādīni
atk-s0513a3:2984_2: āharitvā posesi. Tasmiṃ kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ susāne eko nesādo aniyametvā gijjhānaṃ pāse
atk-s0513a3:2984_3: oḍḍesi. Athekadivasaṃ bodhisatto gomaṃsādiṃ pariyesanto susānaṃ paviṭṭho pādena pāse
atk-s0513a3:2984_4: bajjhitvā attano na cintesi, vuddhe parihīnacakkhuke mātāpitaro anussaritvā “kathaṃ
atk-s0513a3:2984_5: nu kho me mātāpitaro yāpessanti, mama baddhabhāvampi ajānantā anāthā nippaccayā pabbataguhāyameva
atk-s0513a3:2984_6: sussitvā marissanti maññe”ti vilapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2987: Ahaṃ baddhosmi pāsena, nilīyassa vasaṃ gato”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2989: Atha nesādaputto gijjharājassa paridevitasaddaṃ sutvā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:2991: “Kiṃ gijjha paridevasi, kā nu te paridevanā;
atk-s0513a3:2992: Na me suto vā diṭṭho vā, bhāsanto mānusiṃ dijo”ti.
atk-s0513a3:2996: Te kathaṃ nu karissanti, ahaṃ vasaṃ gato tavā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3000: Kasmā jālañca pāsañca, āsajjāpi na bujjhasī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3004: Atha jālañca pāsañca, āsajjāpi na bujjhatī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3007: Mayā tvaṃ samanuññāto, sotthiṃ passāhi ñātake.
atk-s0513a3:3011: Nesādaputtena dutiyā, gijjhena tatiyāti imā gāthā paṭipāṭiyā vuttā.
atk-s0513a3:3012_0: Tattha yaṃ nūti yaṃ nu etaṃ loke kathīyati. Gijjho yojanasataṃ, kuṇapāni avekkhatīti
atk-s0513a3:3012_1: yojanasataṃ atikkamma ṭhitānipi kuṇapāni passati, taṃ yadi tathaṃ, atha kasmā tvaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3012_2: imaṃ jālañca pāsañca āsajjāpi na bujjhasi, santikaṃ āgantvāpi na jānāsīti.
atk-s0513a3:3013_0: Parābhavoti vināso. Bharassūti idaṃ so bodhisattassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā “paṇḍito
atk-s0513a3:3013_1: gijjharājā paridevanto na attano paridevati, mātāpitūnaṃ paridevati, nāyaṃ māretuṃ
atk-s0513a3:3013_2: yutto”ti tussitvā āha, vatvā ca pana piyacittena muducittena pāsaṃ mocesi.
atk-s0513a3:3014: Athassa bodhisatto maraṇamukhā pamutto sukhito anumodanaṃ karonto osānagāthaṃ vatvā mukhapūraṃ maṃsaṃ ādāya mātāpitūnaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3015: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne mātuposakabhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a3:3016: Tadā nesādaputto channo ahosi, mātāpitaro mahārājakulāni, gijjharājā pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a3:3020_0: Anutīracārī bhaddanteti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0513a3:3020_1: kathesi. So hi sāsane pabbajitvā appicchatādiguṇe pahāya mahātaṇho ahosi. Vassūpanāyikāya
atk-s0513a3:3020_2: dve tayo vihāre pariggahetvā ekasmiṃ chattaṃ vā upāhanaṃ vā ekasmiṃ kattarayaṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0513a3:3020_3: vā udakatumbaṃ vā ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ sayaṃ vasati. So ekasmiṃ janapadavihāre vassaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3020_4: upagantvā “bhikkhūhi nāma appicchehi bhavitabba”nti ākāse candaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya
atk-s0513a3:3020_5: bhikkhūnaṃ paccayasantosadīpakaṃ ariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ kathesi. Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū manāpāni
atk-s0513a3:3020_6: pattacīvarāni chaḍḍetvā mattikāpattāni ceva paṃsukūlacīvarāni ca gaṇhiṃsu. So tāni
atk-s0513a3:3020_7: attano vasanaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā vutthavasso pavāretvā yānakaṃ pūretvā jetavanaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0513a3:3020_8: antarāmagge ekassa araññavihārassa piṭṭhibhāge pāde valliyā palibuddho “addhā ettha
atk-s0513a3:3020_9: kiñci laddhabbaṃ bhavissatī”ti taṃ vihāraṃ pāvisi. Tattha pana dve mahallakā bhikkhū
atk-s0513a3:3020_10: vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu. Te dve ca thūlasāṭake ekañca sukhumakambalaṃ labhitvā bhājetuṃ
atk-s0513a3:3020_11: asakkontā taṃ disvā “thero no bhājetvā dassatī”ti tuṭṭhacittā “mayaṃ, bhante, imaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3020_12: vassāvāsikaṃ bhājetuṃ na sakkoma, imaṃ no nissāya vivādo hoti, idaṃ amhākaṃ bhājetvā
atk-s0513a3:3020_13: dethā”ti āhaṃsu. So “sādhu bhājessāmī”ti dve thūlasāṭake dvinnampi bhājetvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3020_14: amhākaṃ vinayadharānaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti kambalaṃ gahetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a3:3021_0: Tepi therā kambale sālayā teneva saddhiṃ jetavanaṃ gantvā vinayadharānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3021_1: tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “labbhati nu kho, bhante, vinayadharānaṃ evaṃ vilopaṃ khāditu”nti
atk-s0513a3:3021_2: āhaṃsu. Bhikkhū upanandattherena ābhataṃ pattacīvararāsiṃ disvā “mahāpuññosi tvaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3021_3: āvuso, bahuṃ te pattacīvaraṃ laddha”nti vadiṃsu. So “kuto me āvuso, puññaṃ, iminā
atk-s0513a3:3021_4: me upāyena idaṃ laddha”nti sabbaṃ kathesi. Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ
atk-s0513a3:3021_5: “āvuso, upanando sakyaputto mahātaṇho mahālobho”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0513a3:3021_6: bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a3:3021_7: upanandena paṭipadāya anucchavikaṃ kataṃ, parassa paṭipadaṃ kathentena nāma bhikkhunā
atk-s0513a3:3021_8: paṭhamaṃ attano anucchavikaṃ katvā pacchā paro ovaditabbo”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3024_0: Imāya dhammapade gāthāya dhammaṃ desetvā “na, bhikkhave, upanando idāneva, pubbepesa
atk-s0513a3:3024_1: mahātaṇho mahālobhova, na ca pana idāneva, pubbepesa imesaṃ santakaṃ vilumpiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:3025_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto nadītīre rukkhadevatā ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:3025_1: Tadā eko siṅgālo māyāviṃ nāma bhariyaṃ gahetvā nadītīre ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasi. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3025_2: siṅgālī siṅgālaṃ āha “dohaḷo me sāmi, uppanno, allarohitamacchaṃ khādituṃ icchāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3025_3: Siṅgālo “appossukkā hohi, āharissāmi te”ti nadītīre caranto valliyā pāde palibujjhitvā
atk-s0513a3:3025_4: anutīrameva agamāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe gambhīracārī ca anutīracārī cāti dve uddā macche
atk-s0513a3:3025_5: pariyesantā tīre aṭṭhaṃsu. Tesu gambhīracārī mahantaṃ rohitamacchaṃ disvā vegena
atk-s0513a3:3025_6: udake pavisitvā taṃ naṅguṭṭhe gaṇhi. Balavā maccho parikaḍḍhanto yāsi. So gambhīracārī
atk-s0513a3:3025_7: uddo “mahāmaccho ubhinnampi no pahossati, ehi me sahāyo hohī”ti itarena saddhiṃ sallapanto
atk-s0513a3:3028: Mahā me gahito maccho, so maṃ harati vegasā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3029_0: Tattha sahāyamanudhāva manti sahāya anudhāva maṃ, sandhivasena ma-kāro vutto. Idaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3029_1: vuttaṃ hoti – yathāhaṃ iminā macchena na saṃhīrāmi, evaṃ maṃ naṅguṭṭhakhaṇḍe gahetvā tvaṃ anudhāvāti.
atk-s0513a3:3034: Tattha thāmasāti thāmena. Uddharissāmīti nīharissāmi. Supaṇṇo uragāmivāti garuḷo sappaṃ viya.
atk-s0513a3:3035_0: Atha dvepi te ekato hutvā rohitamacchaṃ nīharitvā thale ṭhapetvā māretvā “tvaṃ bhājehi,
atk-s0513a3:3035_1: tvaṃ bhājehī”ti kalahaṃ katvā bhājetuṃ asakkontā ṭhapetvā nisīdiṃsu. Tasmiṃ kāle
atk-s0513a3:3035_2: siṅgālo taṃ ṭhānaṃ anuppatto. Te taṃ disvā ubhopi paccuggamanaṃ katvā “ayaṃ, samma,
atk-s0513a3:3035_3: dabbhapupphamaccho amhehi ekato hutvā gahito, taṃ no bhājetuṃ asakkontānaṃ vivādo
atk-s0513a3:3035_4: uppanno, samabhāgaṃ no bhājetvā dehī”ti tatiyaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a3:3039: Tattha dabbhapupphāti dabbhapupphasamānavaṇṇatāya taṃ ālapanti. Medhaganti kalahaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3040: Tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā siṅgālo attano balaṃ dīpento –
atk-s0513a3:3042: “Dhammaṭṭhohaṃ pure āsiṃ, bahū aḍḍā me tīritā;
atk-s0513a3:3049_0: Tattha paṭhamagāthāya ayamattho – ahaṃ pubbe rājūnaṃ vinicchayāmacco āsiṃ, tena mayā
atk-s0513a3:3049_1: vinicchaye nisīditvā bahū aḍḍā tīritā, tesaṃ tesaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikādīnaṃ bahū aḍḍā
atk-s0513a3:3049_2: tīritā vinicchitā, svāhaṃ tumhādisānaṃ samajātikānaṃ catuppadānaṃ aḍḍaṃ tīretuṃ kiṃ
atk-s0513a3:3049_3: na sakkhissāmi, ahaṃ vo samemi medhagaṃ, sammā maṃ nissāya tumhākaṃ vivādo vūpasammatūti.
atk-s0513a3:3050_0: Evañca pana vatvā macchaṃ tayo koṭṭhāse katvā anutīracāri tvaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ gaṇha,
atk-s0513a3:3050_1: sīsaṃ gambhīracārino hotu. Accāyaṃ majjhimo khaṇḍoti apica ayaṃ majjhimo koṭṭhāso.
atk-s0513a3:3050_2: Atha vā accāti aticca, ime dve koṭṭhāse atikkamitvā ṭhito ayaṃ majjhimo khaṇḍo dhammaṭṭhassa
atk-s0513a3:3051_0: Evaṃ taṃ macchaṃ vibhajitvā “tumhe kalahaṃ akatvā naṅguṭṭhañca sīsañca khādathā”ti
atk-s0513a3:3051_1: vatvā majjhimakhaṇḍaṃ mukhena ḍaṃsitvā tesaṃ passantānaṃyeva palāyi. Te sahassaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3055: Tattha cirampīti dve tayo divase sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3056: Siṅgālopi “ajja bhariyaṃ rohitamacchaṃ khādāpessāmī”ti tuṭṭhacitto tassā santikaṃ agamāsi. Sā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā abhinandamānā –
atk-s0513a3:3062: “Kathaṃ nu thalajo santo, udake macchaṃ parāmasi;
atk-s0513a3:3063: Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kathaṃ adhigataṃ tayā”ti. –
atk-s0513a3:3065: Tattha kathaṃ nūti “khāda, bhadde”ti macchakhaṇḍe purato ṭhapite “kathaṃ nu tvaṃ thalajo samāno udake macchaṃ gaṇhī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a3:3069: Jīnā uddā vivādena, bhuñja māyāvi rohita”nti.
atk-s0513a3:3070_0: Tattha vivādena kisā hontīti bhadde, ime sattā vivādaṃ karontā vivādaṃ nissāya kisā
atk-s0513a3:3070_1: appamaṃsalohitā honti. Vivādena dhanakkhayāti hiraññasuvaṇṇādīnaṃ dhanānaṃ khayā
atk-s0513a3:3070_2: vivādeneva honti. Dvīsupi vivadantesu eko parājito parājitattā dhanakkhayaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0513a3:3070_3: itaro jayabhāgadānena. Jīnā uddāti dve uddāpi vivādeneva imaṃ macchaṃ jīnā, tasmā
atk-s0513a3:3070_4: tvaṃ mayā ābhatassa uppattiṃ mā puccha, kevalaṃ imaṃ bhuñja māyāvi rohitanti.
atk-s0513a3:3074: Dhammaṭṭhaṃ paṭidhāvati, so hi nesaṃ vināyako;
atk-s0513a3:3076_0: Tattha evamevāti bhikkhave, yathā ete uddā jīnā, evameva manussesupi yasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0513a3:3076_1: vivādo jāyati, tattha te manussā dhammaṭṭhaṃ patidhāvanti, vinicchayasāmikaṃ upasaṅkamanti.
atk-s0513a3:3076_2: Kiṃkāraṇā? So hi nesaṃ vināyako, so tesaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ vivādavūpasamakoti attho.
atk-s0513a3:3076_3: Dhanāpi tatthāti tattha te vivādāpannā dhanatopi jīyanti, attano santakā parihāyanti,
atk-s0513a3:3076_4: daṇḍena ceva jayabhāgaggahaṇena ca rājakoso pavaḍḍhatīti.
atk-s0513a3:3077: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā siṅgālo upanando ahosi, uddā dve mahallakā, tassa kāraṇassa paccakkhakārikā rukkhadevatā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a3:3081_0: Paṇṇakaṃ tikhiṇadhāranti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3081_1: ārabbha kathesi. Tañhi bhikkhuṃ satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhito”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0513a3:3081_3: ayaṃ itthī tuyhaṃ anatthakārikā, pubbepi tvaṃ imaṃ nissāya cetasikarogena maranto
atk-s0513a3:3081_4: paṇḍite nissāya jīvitaṃ alatthā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a3:3082_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ maddavamahārāje rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0513a3:3082_1: senakakumārotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0513a3:3082_2: bārāṇasiṃ paccāgantvā maddavarañño atthadhammānusāsako amacco ahosi, “senakapaṇḍito”ti
atk-s0513a3:3082_3: vutte sakalanagare cando viya sūriyo viya ca paññāyi. Tadā rañño purohitaputto rājupaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3082_4: āgato sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ uttamarūpadharaṃ rañño aggamahesiṃ disvā paṭibaddhacitto
atk-s0513a3:3082_5: hutvā gehaṃ gantvā nirāhāro nipajjitvā sahāyakehi puṭṭho tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Rājāpi
atk-s0513a3:3082_6: “purohitaputto na dissati, kahaṃ nu kho”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a3:3082_7: “ahaṃ te imaṃ satta divasāni dammi, sattāhaṃ ghare katvā aṭṭhame divase āneyyāsī”ti
atk-s0513a3:3082_8: āha. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā taṃ gehaṃ netvā tāya saddhiṃ abhirami. Te aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3082_9: paṭibaddhacittā hutvā kañci ajānāpetvā aggadvārena palāyitvā aññassa rañño vijitaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3082_10: agamasuṃ, koci gataṭṭhānaṃ na jāni, nāvāya gatamaggo viya ahosi. Rājā nagare bheriṃ
atk-s0513a3:3082_11: carāpetvā nānappakārena vicinantopi tassa gataṭṭhānaṃ na aññāsi. Athassa taṃ nissāya
atk-s0513a3:3082_12: balavasoko uppajji, hadayaṃ uṇhaṃ hutvā lohitaṃ pagghari. Tato paṭṭhāya cassa kucchito
atk-s0513a3:3082_13: lohitaṃ nikkhami, byādhi mahanto ahosi. Mahantāpi rājavejjā tikicchituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a3:3083_0: Bodhisatto “imassa rañño byādhi natthi, bhariyaṃ pana apassanto cetasikarogena phuṭṭho,
atk-s0513a3:3083_1: upāyena taṃ tikicchissāmī”ti āyurañca pukkusañcāti dve rañño paṇḍitāmacce āmantetvā
atk-s0513a3:3083_2: “rañño deviyā adassanena cetasikaṃ rogaṃ ṭhapetvā añño rogo natthi, bahūpakāro ca
atk-s0513a3:3083_3: kho pana amhākaṃ rājā, tasmā upāyena naṃ tikicchāma, rājaṅgaṇe samajjaṃ kāretvā asiṃ
atk-s0513a3:3083_4: gilituṃ jānantena asiṃ gilāpetvā rājānaṃ sīhapañjare katvā samajjaṃ olokāpessāma,
atk-s0513a3:3083_5: rājā asiṃ gilantaṃ disvā ‘atthi nu kho ito aññaṃ dukkaratara’nti pañhaṃ pucchissati.
atk-s0513a3:3083_6: Taṃ samma āyura, tvaṃ ‘asukaṃ nāma dadāmīti vacanaṃ ito dukkaratara’nti byākareyyāsi,
atk-s0513a3:3083_7: tato samma pukkusa, taṃ pucchissati, athassa tvaṃ ‘mahārāja, dadāmīti vatvā adadato
atk-s0513a3:3083_8: sā vācā aphalā hoti, tathārūpaṃ vācaṃ na keci upajīvanti na khādanti na pivanti,
atk-s0513a3:3083_9: ye pana tassa vacanassānucchavikaṃ karonti, yathāpaṭiññātamatthaṃ dentiyeva, idaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3083_10: tato dukkaratara’nti evaṃ byākareyyāsi, ito paraṃ kattabbaṃ ahaṃ jānissāmī”ti vatvā samajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a3:3084_0: Atha te tayopi paṇḍitā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “mahārāja, rājaṅgaṇe samajjo vattati,
atk-s0513a3:3084_1: taṃ olokentānaṃ dukkhampi na dukkhaṃ hoti, ehi gacchāmā”ti rājānaṃ netvā sīhapañjaraṃ
atk-s0513a3:3084_2: vivaritvā samajjaṃ olokāpesuṃ. Bahū janā attano attano jānanakasippaṃ dassesuṃ. Eko
atk-s0513a3:3084_3: pana puriso tettiṃsaṅgulaṃ tikhiṇadhāraṃ asiratanaṃ gilati. Rājā taṃ disvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3084_4: puriso etaṃ asiṃ gilati, ‘atthi nu kho ito aññaṃ dukkaratara’nti ime paṇḍite pucchissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a3:3087: Parisāyaṃ puriso gilati, kiṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
atk-s0513a3:3088: Yadaññaṃ dukkaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3089_0: Tattha paṇṇakanti paṇṇakaraṭṭhe uppannaṃ. Sampannapāyinanti sampannaṃ paralohitapāyinaṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3089_1: Parisāyanti parisamajjhe dhanalobhena ayaṃ puriso gilati. Yadaññanti ito asigilanato
atk-s0513a3:3089_2: yaṃ aññaṃ dukkarataraṃ kāraṇaṃ, taṃ mayā pucchito kathehīti.
atk-s0513a3:3090: Athassa so taṃ kathento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3093: Yo ca vajjā dadāmīti, taṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
atk-s0513a3:3094: Sabbaññaṃ sukaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, evaṃ jānāhi maddavā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3095_0: Tattha vajjāti vadeyya. Taṃ dukkarataranti “dadāmī”ti vacanaṃ tato asigilanato dukkarataraṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3095_1: Sabbaññanti “asukaṃ nāma tava dassāmī”ti vacanaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ sabbampi kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3096_0: Rañño āyurapaṇḍitassa vacanaṃ sutvā “asigilanato kira ‘idaṃ nāma dammī’ti vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3096_1: dukkaraṃ, ahañca ‘purohitaputtassa deviṃ dammī’ti avacaṃ, atidukkaraṃ vata me kata”nti
atk-s0513a3:3096_2: vīmaṃsantasseva hadayasoko thokaṃ tanuttaṃ gato. So tato “parassa imaṃ dammīti vacanato
atk-s0513a3:3096_3: pana aññaṃ dukkarataraṃ atthi nu kho”ti cintetvā pukkusapaṇḍitena saddhiṃ sallapanto tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3099: Pukkusaṃ dāni pucchāmi, kiṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
atk-s0513a3:3100: Yadaññaṃ dukkaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3101: Tattha pañhaṃ atthanti pañhassa atthaṃ byākāsīti vuttaṃ hoti. Dhammassa kovidoti tadatthajotake ganthe kusalo. Tatoti tato vacanato kiṃ dukkarataranti.
atk-s0513a3:3105: Yo ca datvā avākayirā, taṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
atk-s0513a3:3106: Sabbaññaṃ sukaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, evaṃ jānāhi maddavā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3107_0: Tattha datvāti “asukaṃ nāma dammī”ti paṭiññaṃ datvā. Avākayirāti taṃ paṭiññātamatthaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3107_1: dadanto tasmiṃ lobhaṃ avākareyya chindeyya, taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ dadeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tatoti
atk-s0513a3:3107_2: tato asigilanato “asukaṃ nāma te dammī”ti vacanato ca tadeva dukkarataraṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3108_0: Rañño taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “ahaṃ ‘purohitaputtassa deviṃ dammī’ti paṭhamaṃ vatvā vācāya
atk-s0513a3:3108_1: anucchavikaṃ katvā taṃ adāsiṃ, dukkaraṃ vata me kata”nti parivitakkentassa soko tanukataro
atk-s0513a3:3108_2: jāto. Athassa etadahosi “senakapaṇḍitato añño paṇḍitataro nāma natthi, imaṃ pañhaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3108_3: etaṃ pucchissāmī”ti. Tato taṃ pucchanto pañcamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3111: Senakaṃ dāni pucchāmi, kiṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
atk-s0513a3:3112: Yadaññaṃ dukkaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3115: “Dadeyya puriso dānaṃ, appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ;
atk-s0513a3:3116: Yo ca datvā nānutappe, taṃ dukkarataraṃ tato;
atk-s0513a3:3117: Sabbaññaṃ sukaraṃ ṭhānaṃ, evaṃ jānāhi maddavā”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3118_0: Tattha nānutappeti attano atikantaṃ atimanāpaṃ piyabhaṇḍaṃ parassa datvā “kimatthaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3118_1: mayā idaṃ dinna”nti evaṃ taṃ piyabhaṇḍaṃ ārabbha yo pacchā na tappati na socati,
atk-s0513a3:3118_2: taṃ asigilanato ca “asukaṃ nāma te dammī”ti vacanato ca tassa dānato ca dukkarataraṃ.
atk-s0513a3:3119: Iti mahāsatto rājānaṃ saññāpentā kathesi. Dānañhi datvā aparacetanāva dussandhāriyā, tassā sandhāraṇadukkaratā vessantarajātakena dīpitā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0513a3:3121: Ānessāmi sake putte, puttānañhi vadho dukho.
atk-s0513a3:3124_0: Rājāpi bodhisattassa vacanaṃ sutvā sallakkhesi “ahaṃ attano maneneva purohitaputtassa
atk-s0513a3:3124_1: deviṃ datvā sakamanaṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkomi, socāmi kilamāmi, na me idaṃ anucchavikaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3124_2: sace sā mayi sasinehā bhaveyya, imaṃ issariyaṃ chaḍḍetvā na palāyeyya, mayi pana
atk-s0513a3:3124_3: sinehaṃ akatvā palātāya kiṃ tāya mayha”nti. Tassevaṃ cintentassa padumapatte udakabindu
atk-s0513a3:3124_4: viya sabbasoko nivattitvā gato, taṅkhaṇaññevassa kucchi parisaṇṭhāsi. So nirogo sukhito
atk-s0513a3:3127: Sabbe pañhe atibhoti, yathā bhāsati senako”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3128: Tattha yathā bhāsatīti yathā paṇḍito bhāsati, tathevetaṃ dānaṃ nāma datvā neva anutappitabbanti. Imaṃ panassa thutiṃ katvā tuṭṭho bahuṃ dhanamadāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3129_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi, saccapariyosāne
atk-s0513a3:3129_1: ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Tadā rājamahesī purāṇadutiyikā ahosi,
atk-s0513a3:3129_2: rājā ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu, āyurapaṇḍito moggallāno, pukkusapaṇḍito sāriputto, senakapaṇḍito ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a3:3133: Vibbhantacittoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto attano paññāpāramiṃ ārabbha kathesi. Paccuppannavatthu umaṅgajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a3:3134_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ janako nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Tadā bodhisatto brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0513a3:3134_1: senakakumārotissa nāmaṃ kariṃsu. So vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0513a3:3134_2: bārāṇasiṃ paccāgantvā rājānaṃ passi, rājā taṃ amaccaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi, mahantañcassa
atk-s0513a3:3134_3: yasaṃ anuppadāsi. So rañño atthañca dhammañca anusāsi, madhurakatho dhammakathiko
atk-s0513a3:3134_4: hutvā rājānaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā dāne uposathakamme dasasu kusalakammapathesūti
atk-s0513a3:3134_5: imāya kalyāṇapaṭipadāya patiṭṭhāpesi, sakalaraṭṭhe buddhānaṃ uppannakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0513a3:3134_6: Pakkhadivasesu rājā ca uparājādayo ca sabbe sannipatitvā dhammasabhaṃ sajjenti. Mahāsatto
atk-s0513a3:3134_7: sajjitadhammasabhāyaṃ ratanapallaṅkavaragato buddhalīḷāya dhammaṃ deseti, buddhānaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3135_0: Atha aññataro mahallakabrāhmaṇo dhanabhikkhaṃ caritvā kahāpaṇasahassaṃ labhitvā ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a3:3135_1: brāhmaṇakule nikkhipitvā puna “bhikkhaṃ carissāmī”ti gato. Tassa gatakāle taṃ kulaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3135_2: kahāpaṇe vaḷañjesi. So āgantvā kahāpaṇe āharāpesi. Brāhmaṇo kahāpaṇe dātuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0513a3:3135_3: attano dhītaraṃ tassa pādaparicārikaṃ katvā adāsi. Brāhmaṇo taṃ gahetvā bārāṇasito
atk-s0513a3:3135_4: avidūre ekasmiṃ brāhmaṇagāme vāsaṃ kappesi. Athassa bhariyā daharatāya kāmesu atittā
atk-s0513a3:3135_5: aññena taruṇabrāhmaṇena saddhiṃ micchācāraṃ cari. Soḷasa hi atappanīyavatthūni nāma.
atk-s0513a3:3135_6: Katamāni soḷasa? Sāgaro sabbasavantīhi na tappati, aggi upādānena na tappati, rājā
atk-s0513a3:3135_7: raṭṭhena na tappati, bālo pāpehi na tappati, itthī methunadhammena alaṅkārena vijāyanenāti
atk-s0513a3:3135_8: imehi tīhi na tappati, brāhmaṇo mantehi na tappati, jhāyī vihārasamāpattiyā na tappati,
atk-s0513a3:3135_9: sekkho apacayena na tappati, appiccho dhutaṅgaguṇena na tappati, āraddhavīriyo vīriyārambhena
atk-s0513a3:3135_10: na tappati, dhammakathiko sākacchāya na tappati, visārado parisāya na tappati, saddho
atk-s0513a3:3135_11: saṅghupaṭṭhānena na tappati, dāyako pariccāgena na tappati, paṇḍito dhammassavanena
atk-s0513a3:3135_12: na tappati, catasso parisā tathāgatadassanena na tappantīti.
atk-s0513a3:3136_0: Sāpi brāhmaṇī methunadhammena, atittā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nīharitvā vissatthā pāpakammaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3136_1: kātukāmā hutvā ekadivasaṃ dummanā nipajjitvā “kiṃ bhotī”ti vuttā “brāhmaṇa, ahaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3136_2: tava gehe kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkomi, dāsidāsaṃ ānehī”ti āha. “Bhoti dhanaṃ me natthi,
atk-s0513a3:3136_3: kiṃ datvā ānemī”ti. “Bhikkhaṃ caritvā dhanaṃ pariyesitvā ānehī”ti. “Tena hi bhoti
atk-s0513a3:3136_4: pātheyyaṃ me sajjehī”ti. “Sā tassa baddhasattūnañca abaddhasattūnañca cammapasibbakaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3136_5: pūretvā adāsi”. Brāhmaṇo gāmanigamarājadhānīsu caranto satta kahāpaṇasatāni labhitvā
atk-s0513a3:3136_6: “alaṃ me ettakaṃ dhanaṃ dāsidāsamūlāyā”ti nivattitvā attano gāmaṃ āgacchanto ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a3:3136_7: udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne pasibbakaṃ muñcitvā sattuṃ khāditvā pasibbakamukhaṃ abandhitvāva
atk-s0513a3:3136_8: pānīyaṃ pivituṃ otiṇṇo. Athekasmiṃ rukkhasusire eko kaṇhasappo sattugandhaṃ ghāyitvā
atk-s0513a3:3136_9: pasibbakaṃ pavisitvā bhogaṃ ābhujitvā sattuṃ khādanto nipajji. Brāhmaṇo āgantvā pasibbakassa
atk-s0513a3:3136_10: abbhantaraṃ anoloketvā pasibbakaṃ bandhitvā aṃse katvā pāyāsi. Antarāmagge ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a3:3136_11: rukkhe nibbattadevatā khandhaviṭape ṭhatvā “brāhmaṇa, sace antarāmagge vasissasi,
atk-s0513a3:3136_12: sayaṃ marissasi, sace ajja gharaṃ gamissasi, bhariyā te marissatī”ti vatvā antaradhāyi.
atk-s0513a3:3136_13: So olokento devataṃ adisvā bhīto maraṇabhayatajjito rodanto paridevanto bārāṇasinagaradvāraṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a3:3137_0: Tadā ca pannarasuposatho hoti alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā bodhisattassa dhammakathanadivaso.
atk-s0513a3:3137_1: Mahājano nānāgandhapupphādihattho vaggavaggo hutvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ sotuṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a3:3137_2: Brāhmaṇo taṃ disvā “kahaṃ gacchathā”ti pucchitvā “brāhmaṇa, ajja senakapaṇḍito madhurassarena
atk-s0513a3:3137_3: buddhalīḷāya dhammaṃ deseti, kiṃ tvampi na jānāsī”ti vutte cintesi “paṇḍito kira
atk-s0513a3:3137_4: dhammakathiko, ahañcamhi maraṇabhayatajjito, paṇḍitā kho pana mahantampi sokaṃ harituṃ
atk-s0513a3:3137_5: sakkonti, mayāpi tattha gantvā dhammaṃ sotuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So tehi saddhiṃ tattha gantvā
atk-s0513a3:3137_6: mahāsattaṃ parivāretvā nisinnāya sarājikāya parisāya pariyante sattupasibbakena khandhagatena
atk-s0513a3:3137_7: dhammāsanato avidūre maraṇabhayatajjito rodamāno aṭṭhāsi. Mahāsatto ākāsagaṅgaṃ otaranto
atk-s0513a3:3137_8: viya amatavassaṃ vassento viya ca dhammaṃ desesi. Mahājano sañjātasomanasso sādhukāraṃ
atk-s0513a3:3138_0: Paṇḍitā ca nāma disācakkhukā honti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahāsatto pasannapañcapasādāni akkhīni
atk-s0513a3:3138_1: ummīletvā samantato parisaṃ olokento taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā cintesi “ettakā parisā somanassajātā
atk-s0513a3:3138_2: sādhukāraṃ datvā dhammaṃ suṇanti, ayaṃ paneko brāhmaṇo domanassappatto rodati, etassa
atk-s0513a3:3138_3: abbhantare assujananasamatthena sokena bhavitabbaṃ, tamassa ambilena paharitvā tambamalaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3138_4: viya padumapalāsato udakabinduṃ viya vinivattetvā ettheva naṃ nissokaṃ tuṭṭhamānasaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3138_5: katvā dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti. So taṃ āmantetvā “brāhmaṇa, senakapaṇḍito nāmāhaṃ, idāneva
atk-s0513a3:3138_6: taṃ nissokaṃ karissāmi, vissattho kathehī”ti tena saddhiṃ sallapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3141: Kiṃ te naṭṭhaṃ kiṃ pana patthayāno, idhāgamā brahme tadiṅgha brūhī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3142_0: Tattha kupitindriyosīti cakkhundriyameva sandhāya “kupitindriyosī”ti āha. Vārigaṇāti
atk-s0513a3:3142_1: assubindūni. Iṅghāti codanatthe nipāto. Tañhi mahāsatto codento evamāha “brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a3:3142_2: sattā nāma dvīhi kāraṇehi socanti paridevanti sattasaṅkhāresu kismiñcideva piyajātike
atk-s0513a3:3142_3: naṭṭhe vā, kiñcideva piyajātikaṃ patthetvā alabhantā vā. Tattha kiṃ te naṭṭhaṃ, kiṃ
atk-s0513a3:3142_4: vā pana patthayanto tvaṃ idha āgato, idaṃ me khippaṃ brūhī”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3143: Athassa attano sokakāraṇaṃ kathento brāhmaṇo dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3145: “Miyyetha bhariyā vajato mamajja, agacchato maraṇamāha yakkho;
atk-s0513a3:3146: Etena dukkhena pavedhitosmi, akkhāhi me senaka etamattha”nti.
atk-s0513a3:3147_0: Tattha vajatoti gehaṃ gacchantassa. Agacchatoti agacchantassa. Yakkhoti antarāmagge
atk-s0513a3:3147_1: ekā rukkhadevatā evamāhāti vadati. Sā kira devatā “pasibbake te brāhmaṇa, kaṇhasappo”ti
atk-s0513a3:3147_2: anācikkhantī bodhisattassa ñāṇānubhāvappakāsanatthaṃ nācikkhi. Etena dukkhenāti gacchato
atk-s0513a3:3147_3: bhariyāya maraṇadukkhena, agacchato attano maraṇadukkhena, tenasmi pavedhito ghaṭṭito
atk-s0513a3:3147_4: kampito. Etamatthanti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Yena me kāraṇena gacchato bhariyāya maraṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3147_5: agacchato attano maraṇaṃ hoti, etaṃ me kāraṇaṃ ācikkhāhīti attho.
atk-s0513a3:3148_0: Mahāsatto brāhmaṇassa vacanaṃ sutvā samuddamatthake jālaṃ khipanto viya ñāṇajālaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3148_1: pattharitvā “imesaṃ sattānaṃ bahūni maraṇakāraṇāni. Samudde nimuggāpi maranti, tattha
atk-s0513a3:3148_2: vāḷamacchehi gahitāpi, gaṅgāya patitāpi, tattha susumārehi gahitāpi, rukkhato patitāpi,
atk-s0513a3:3148_3: kaṇṭakena viddhāpi, nānappakārehi āvudhehi pahaṭāpi, visaṃ khāditvāpi, ubbandhitvāpi,
atk-s0513a3:3148_4: papāte patitāpi, atisītādīhi vā nānappakārehi vā rogehi upaddutāpi marantiyeva, evaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3148_5: bahūsu maraṇakāraṇesu katarena nu kho kāraṇena ajjesa brāhmaṇo antarāmagge vasanto
atk-s0513a3:3148_6: sayaṃ marissati, gehamassa vajato bhariyā marissatī”ti cintesi. Cintento eva brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0513a3:3148_7: khandhe pasibbakaṃ disvā “imasmiṃ pasibbake ekena sappena paviṭṭhena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a3:3148_8: pavisanto ca paneso imasmiṃ brāhmaṇe pātarāsasamaye sattuṃ khāditvā pasibbakamukhaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3148_9: abandhitvā pānīyaṃ pātuṃ gate sattugandhena sappo paviṭṭho bhavissati. Brāhmaṇopi
atk-s0513a3:3148_10: pānīyaṃ pivitvā āgato sappassa paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ ajānitvā pasibbakaṃ bandhitvā ādāya
atk-s0513a3:3148_11: pakkanto bhavissati, sacāyaṃ antarāmagge vasanto sāyaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne “sattuṃ khādissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a3:3148_12: pasibbakaṃ muñcitvā hatthaṃ pavesessati, atha naṃ sappo hatthe ḍaṃsitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3148_13: pāpessati, idamassa antarāmagge vasantassa maraṇakāraṇaṃ. Sace pana gehaṃ gaccheyya,
atk-s0513a3:3148_14: pasibbako bhariyāya hatthagato bhavissati, sā ‘antobhaṇḍaṃ olokessāmī”ti pasibbakaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3148_15: muñcitvā hatthaṃ pavesessati, atha naṃ sappo ḍaṃsitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessati, idamassa
atk-s0513a3:3148_16: ajja gehaṃ gatassa bhariyāya maraṇakāraṇa”nti upāyakosallañāṇeneva aññāsi.
atk-s0513a3:3149_0: Athassa etadahosi “iminā kaṇhasappena sūrena nibbhayena bhavitabbaṃ. Ayañhi brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0513a3:3149_1: mahāphāsukaṃ paharantopi pasibbake attano calanaṃ vā phandanaṃ vā na dasseti, evarūpāya
atk-s0513a3:3149_2: parisāya majjhepi attano atthibhāvaṃ na dasseti, tasmā iminā kaṇhasappena sūrena
atk-s0513a3:3149_3: nibbhayena bhavitabba”nti. Idampi so upāyakosallañāṇeneva dibbacakkhunā passanto
atk-s0513a3:3149_4: viya aññāsi. Evaṃ sarājikāya parisāya majjhe sappaṃ pasibbakaṃ pavisantaṃ disvā ṭhitapuriso
atk-s0513a3:3149_5: viya mahāsatto upāyakosallañāṇeneva paricchinditvā brāhmaṇassa pañhaṃ kathento tatiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a3:3151: “Bahūni ṭhānāni vicintayitvā, yamettha vakkhāmi tadeva saccaṃ;
atk-s0513a3:3152: Maññāmi te brāhmaṇa sattubhastaṃ, ajānato kaṇhasappo paviṭṭho”ti.
atk-s0513a3:3153_0: Tattha bahūni ṭhānānīti bahūni kāraṇāni. Vicintayitvāti paṭivijjhitvā cintāvasena
atk-s0513a3:3153_1: pavattapaṭivedho hutvā. Yamettha vakkhāmīti yaṃ te ahaṃ etesu kāraṇesu etaṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3153_2: vakkhāmi. Tadeva saccanti tadeva tathaṃ dibbacakkhunā disvā kathitasadisaṃ bhavissatīti
atk-s0513a3:3153_3: dīpeti. Maññāmīti sallakkhemi. Sattubhastanti sattupasibbakaṃ. Ajānatoti ajānantasseva
atk-s0513a3:3154_0: Evañca pana vatvā “atthi te brāhmaṇa, etasmiṃ pasibbake sattū”ti pucchi. “Atthi,
atk-s0513a3:3154_1: paṇḍitā”ti. “Ajja pātarāsavelāya sattuṃ khādī”ti? “Āma, paṇḍitā”ti. “Kattha nisīditvā”ti?
atk-s0513a3:3154_2: “Araññe rukkhamūlasmiṃ, paṇḍitā”ti. “Sattuṃ khāditvā pānīyaṃ pātuṃ gacchanto pasibbakamukhaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3154_3: bandhi, na bandhī”ti? “Na bandhiṃ, paṇḍitā”ti. “Pānīyaṃ pivitvā āgato pasibbakaṃ
atk-s0513a3:3154_4: oloketvā bandhī”ti. “Anoloketvāva bandhiṃ, paṇḍitā”ti. “Brāhmaṇa, tava pānīyaṃ pātuṃ
atk-s0513a3:3154_5: gatakāle ajānantasseva te sattugandhena pasibbakaṃ sappo paviṭṭhoti maññāmi, evamettha
atk-s0513a3:3154_6: āgato tvaṃ, tasmā pasibbakaṃ otāretvā parisamajjhe ṭhapetvā pasibbakamukhaṃ mocetvā
